name: Abjure Enemy
summary: Abjure Enemy is an Oath of Vengeance Action. This ability allows them to Frighten an enemy.
description:
Frightened (Condition)|Frighten an enemy. They'll be easier to hit and cannot move. Fiends and undead have Disadvantage on this Saving Throw

On Save: Target is Slowed instead.

name: Absorb Intellect
summary: Absorb Intellect is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows a character to lower an enemies Intelligence by 1 per turn and heal themselves for 5 turns.
description: Gobble up a foe's intellect, lowering their Intelligence by 1 per turn and healing your wounds for 5 turns.

name: Acid Breath
summary: Acid Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of damaging acid in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of acid.

name: Acidic Regurgitation
summary: Acidic Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Acid Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit acid, covering creatures and creating an acid puddle.

name: Ancient Grudges
summary: Ancient Grudges is a Bonus Action granted by Aberration Hunters' Amulet.
description: Touch your amulet to subsume a sliver of the knowledge of the gith. You gain Advantage on aberrations.

name: Arcane Recovery
summary: Arcane Recovery is a Wizard Class Action. This ability allows you to regain half your Wizard level, rounded up, in Spell Slots once per day.
description: Once per day out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.
notes:
The recovered spell slots must have a combined level that is less than or equal to half your Wizard level (rounded up), with a maximum of a 5th level Spell Slot.
* For example: 
** When a Level 3 Wizard uses Arcane Recovery:
*** The highest Level of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: 3 ÷ 2 = 1.5 ≈ 2
*** The total number of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: two Level 1 Spell Slots or one Level 2 Spell Slot.
** When a Level 5 Wizard uses Arcane Recovery:
*** The highest Level of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: 5 ÷ 2 = 2.5 ≈ 3
*** The total number of Spell Slots that can be recovered is: three Level 1 Spell Slots or one Level 2 Spell Slot and one Level 1 Spell Slot or one Level 3 Spell Slot.

name: Aura of Courage
summary: Aura of Courage is a Paladin Class Action. This ability allows a Paladin to protect their allies from fear.
description: You and any nearby allies can't be Frightened. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.

name: Aura of Devotion
summary: Aura of Devotion is a Class Feature of Oath of Devotion. This ability allows a Paladin to protect their allies from being Charmed.
description: You and any nearby allies can't be Charmed. The aura disappears if you fall Unconscious.

name: Aura of Protection
summary: Aura of Protection is a Paladin Passive Feature that improves the Paladin's and all nearby allies' Saving Throws.
description: You and nearby allies gain a bonus to SavingThrows equal to your Charisma modifier.

name: Awaken
summary: Awaken is an Action used by Grym to ready itself for combat on it's first turn.
description: Nearby activity rouses Grym, readying it to crush any who set their eyes on his forge.

name: Bad Omen
summary: Bad Omen is an Action gained by the Beast Master Dire Raven Companion at level 5.
description: Hurl one of your feathers at a target to mark it as cursed.

name: Beak Attack (Dire Raven Companion)
summary: Beak Attack is a Dire Raven Companion Action. Dire Ravens use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Piercing Damage to enemies.
description: Peck at a target.

name: Beak Attack (Dire Raven Wild Shape)
summary: Beak Attack is a Wild Shape: Dire Raven Action. Dire Ravens and Ravens use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Piercing Damage to enemies.
description: Peck at a target, dealing 2d4 + Dexterity Modifier|Piercing damage.

name: Beak Attack (Raven Familiar)
summary: Beak Attack is a Find Familiar: Raven Action. Ravens use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Piercing Damage to enemies.
description: Peck at a target.

name: Beak Attack (Shadow-Cursed Raven)
summary: Beak Attack is a Shadow-Cursed Raven Action. Ravens use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Piercing Damage to enemies.
description: Peck at a target.

name: Bear Companion
summary: Bear Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Bind Pact Weapon
summary: Bind Pact Weapon is a class action available to Warlocks that choose Pact of the Blade at level 3. This is for binding to existing weapons - if you want to summon a new weapon use Pact of the Blade.
description:
Bind to your main hand weapon. Its damage becomes magical, you cannot drop or throw it, and you become Proficient with it if you weren't already.

You can only have 1 pact weapon at any time.


The weapon returns to its previous state if you are more than 1.5m away from it for more than 10 rounds.

name: Bite (Cloaker)
summary: Bite is an action available to Cloakers that lets them deal piercing damage and cause Bleeding.
description: Bite a target.

name: Bite (General)
summary: Bite is an action that deals piercing damage.
description: Bite a target.

name: Blade of Rime
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to use their equivalent of Ice Knife by expending ki|forceplural=yes instead of Spell Slots.
description:
Throw a shard of ice that deals 1d10|Piercing damage. It explodes and deals 2d6|Cold to anyone nearby. It leaves an ice surface.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced|Silenced.

name: Blessing of the Trickster
summary: Blessing of the Trickster is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to improve the Stealth Checks of an allied creature.
description:
Grant another creature Advantage on Stealth Checks.

Only affects one target at a time.

name: Bloody Bonesaw
summary: Bloody Bonesaw is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to hack at a target with a Bonesaw. He must have his assistant hand him the tool first.
description: Hack at a target and possibly Slowed|Slow it.

name: Boar Charge
summary: Boar Charge is a Boar Companion Action. Boars use this ability to charge toward enemies and deal Slashing Damage as well as knock them Prone.
description: Charge forward, attacking all hostile creatures in the way. Deals 1d4 + 1|Slashing and potentially knocks targets Prone.

name: Boar Companion
summary: Boar Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Bolstering Magic: Boon
summary: Bolstering Magic: Boon is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability gives bonuses to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for up to a minute, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally receive d4|Physical +1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls and Ability Checks for 10 turns.

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 1 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 1 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 1 Spell Slot

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 2 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action. This ability recovers a Level 2 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 2 Spell Slot

name: Bolstering Magic: Level 3 Spell Slot
summary: Bolstering Magic: Level 3 Spell Slot is a Wild Magic Barbarian Class Action class action. This ability recovers a Level 3 spell slot for you or an ally, once per long rest.
description: You or an ally recover a Level 3 Spell Slot

name: Burrow (Badger)
summary: Burrow is a Wild Shape: Badger Action. Badgers use this ability to burrow themselves underground and traverse through terrain.
description: Burrow into the ground and emerge at the target position, possibly knocking nearby creatures Prone.

name: Bursting Brood
summary: Bursting Brood is an action available to the level 11 or higher Wolf Spider Companion from the Beast Master that deals damage and infests a target.
description: Launch of clutch of brood to Infested (Condition)|Infest your target.

name: Charge
summary: Charge is a Wild Shape: Deep Rothé Action.  Deep Rothés use this ability to ram into enemies in a straight line, dealing Piercing damage and possibly knocking them Prone.
description:
Charge forward, attacking all hostile creatures in your way. Deal 2d6 + Strength Modifier|Piercing damage and potentially knock targets Prone.

Doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Charge (Minotaur)
summary: Charge is a class action available to Minotaurs that allows them to charge forward, push foes and leave them Prone.
description: Charge forward, attacking all enemies in the way, pushing them back 2m and possibly knocking them Prone.

name: Charm Animals and Plants
summary: Charm Animals and Plants is an Action available to Nature Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to reduce the aggressiveness of nearby fauna and flora.
description: Channel fey magic to Charmed|Charm nearby beasts and plants.

name: Chill of the Mountain
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to hit with cold damage and reduce the movement speed of their opponent. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Ray of Frost.
description: Call forth the cold mountain winds and reduce the target's movement speed by ft=10.

name: Claws (Badger)
summary: Claws (Badger) is a Wild Shape: Badger Action. Badgers use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Slashing Damage to enemies and possibly pushes them away.
description: Lash out with deadly claws. The target takes 1d4 + Strength Modifier|Slashing damage and might be pushed m=1.5|ft=5ft away.

name: Claws (Bear Wild Shape)
summary: Claws is a Wild Shape: Bear Action. Bears use this ability to make a melee attack that deals Slashing Damage to enemies.
description: Lash out with deadly claws.

name: Claws (Cat)
summary: Claws is a Wild Shape: Cat and Find Familiar: Cat Action. Cats use this ability to make melee attacks and deal Slashing Damage to enemies that try to rub their bellies.
description: Lash out with deadly claws to deal 2|Slashing damage.

name: Cloak of Shadows
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that allows you to enter the shadows and disappear from sight.
description:
Wrap yourself in shadows to become Cloak of Shadows|Invisible if you are Obscured.

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage.

name: Cocoon
summary: Cocoon is an action gained by the Beast Master Wolf Spider Companion at level 5. This ability allows the wolf spider to wrap enemies up in cocoons, incapacitating them for a while.
description: Trap a creature in your web to Cocooned (Condition)|Cocoon it.

name: Commander's Strike
summary: Commander's Strike is a Battle Master Action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to expend an action, bonus action, and Superiority Dice to have an ally make an weapon attack on their next turn using a reaction.
description: Direct an ally to strike a foe. The ally uses a reaction on their next turn to make a weapon attack.

name: Concentrated Blast
summary: Concentrated Blast is an Action and 3d6|Psychic}} damage to an enemy, but can only be cast by a character who is [[Concentration|concentrating on another spell. If the target is also concentrating on a spell, the caster is healed for an amount equal to the damage dealt. When this ability is used, whatever spell the caster was concentrating on will end.
description:
You must be concentrating on another spell to cast this. If the target was concentrating, you heal as much as the damage that was dealt to it. 

The spell you were concentrating on will end.

name: Concussive Burst
summary: Concussive Burst is a class action available to Yurgir that deals Thunder damage and knocks them backwards. Functions similarly to Thunderwave.
description: A thunderous blast that ripples over your foes and pushes them back.

name: Control Undead
summary: Control Undead is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to gain control over the undead.
description: Use the power of your Oath to gain control over an undead creature. The undead will follow you around and attack your enemies. The target's level must be lower than yours.

name: Daddy's Lecture
summary: Daddy's Lecture is a unique action available to Daddy. It deals 3d10|Necrotic damage.
description: Daddy infuses his hand with putrefying energy to discipline the naughty children.

name: Dash
summary: Dash is a common Action. This ability allow characters to double their movement speed.
description: Cover more distance this turn: double your Movement Speed.

name: Defensive Flourish (Melee)
summary: Defensive Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

name: Defensive Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Defensive Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to enemies with Ranged Weapons and increase their own Armour Class if it hits.
description: Attack defensively, increasing your Armour Class by 4 if you hit.

name: Devour
summary: Devour is a Class Action commonly used by Ghouls and Flying Ghouls. This ability allows the user to bite down on a disabled opponent, inflicting great damage.
description: Bite a knocked down, prone, or sleeping target, and deal 3d10 + Strength Modifier|Slashing damage. Heal that many hit points.

name: Dire Raven Companion
summary: Dire Raven Companion is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Displace (Displacer Beast)
summary: Displace  is a class action available to Displacer Beasts that allows a creature to teleport themself and a target, dealing the target Psychic damage and leaving behind an Illusory Copy.
description: Teleport yourself and a target to a nearby location, shredding the target's mind, and leaving behind an Illusory Copy of yourself.

name: Displacer Beast Shape
summary: Displacer Beast Shape is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows a character to transform into a Displacer Beast that can Displace itself and enemies, and has 85 Hit Points. This action is only available after becoming a Partial-Illithid.
description:
Transform into a displacer beast that can Displace itself and enemies, and has Healing|85 hit points.

You take on the attributes of a displacer beast, but maintain your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your displacer beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your original form.

name: Divine Intervention: Golden Generosity
summary:
Divine Intervention: Golden Generosity is a Cleric one-time class action that can perform a Divine Intervention.
This ability spawns a chest Bestowed Bounty on the ground next to the cleric, containing Camp Supplies, Potion of Superior Healing|superior or Potion of Supreme Healing|supreme healing potions, and six to seven elixirs. If you re-spec your cleric, the Bestowed Bounty chest will vanish, but any items that were inside it will drop on the ground in the same location.
description: Call upon your deity to provide you with a rich bounty of potions and Camp Supplies.

name: Divine Strike
summary: Divine Strike is a Weapon Action-like ability available to level 8 Life,  Trickery, Nature, Tempest, and War. Divine Strike deals 1 ~ 8 additional damage upon a weapon strike (either melee or ranged) of a type dependent on the chosen Domain.
description:
* Divine Strike Radiant Melee Icon Melee Skill: Once per turn deal 1d8 {Variation Damage Type} damage in addition to your weapon's {Weapon Damage} {Weapon Type} damage.
* Divine Strike Radiant Ranged Icon Ranged Skill and Reaction: Deal an additional 1d8 {Variation Damage Type} damage.

name: Dreadful Aspect
summary: Dreadful Aspect is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to channel their dark emotions to frighten their enemies.
description: Let your darkest emotions burst forth as a menacing pulse to Frightened|Frighten nearby enemies.

name: Electrified Regurgitation
summary: Electrified Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Electrified Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit an electrified fluid that can Stunned|Stun those it hits.

name: Embrace of the Inferno
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to cast Scorching Ray as a class action. Embrace of the Inferno hurls 3 rays of fire at targets within range. You can either target a single creature or multiple creatures with the rays. Each ray rolls a separate Attack Roll and deals Fire damage.

name: Explosive Retribution
summary: Explosive Retribution is a class action available to Yurgir that allows him to toss 14 Orthonic Handbombs around him.
description: Toss a cluster of damaging explosives around you that explode in 2 turns, dealing 4d8|Fire and 4d8|Force damage.

name: Extract Brain
summary: Extract Brain is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability lets a creature try to extract a Stunned or Unconscious creature's brain and heal themself.
description: Try to extract the brain of a Stunned or Unconscious creature.

name: Fangs of the Fire Snake
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to hit an enemy, dealing unarmed damage with 1d10|Fire, and deal an extra 1d4|Fire damage on their next melee attack.
description: Hit foes from afar.  Your next melee attacks deal an additional 1d4|Fire damage.

name: Fey Presence
summary: Fey Presence is an Archfey Action. This ability allows the Warlock to charm or frighten enemies at short range.
description: Charmed|Charm or Frightened|Frighten nearby foes with the feywild's beguiling, disturbing magics.

name: Fiendish Resilience
summary: Fiendish Resilience is a class action unique to the Fiend subclass that lets the Warlock choose a damage type to be resistant to every Short Rest.
description: Choose a damage type and become Resistant to it. You can pick a new damage type each Short Rest. You can only have 1 type of Resistance at a time.

name: Fiery Regurgitation
summary: Fiery Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Burning Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit fire.
notes: Creates a Fire Surface for 2 turns

name: Fire Breath (Cone)
summary:
Fire Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of damaging flame in a target direction.

See also: Fire Breath (Line) for the Brass Dragonborn racial action.
description: Spew forth a column of fire.

name: Fire Breath (Line)
summary:
Fire Breath is a Brass Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a line of damaging flame in a target direction.

See also: Fire Breath (Cone) for the Gold Dragonborn and Red Dragonborn racial action.
description: Spew forth a column of fire.

name: Fist of Four Thunders
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to push creatures and objects away. It is the Monk equivalent of Thunderwave.
description: Release a wave of thunderous force that pushes away all creatures and objects.
notes: When creatures succeeds in saving, they will not be pushed back, but will still take half the damage.

name: Fist of Unbroken Air
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to punch an enemy at distance, sending them flying backwards..
description: Push the target back m=6|ft=20 and knock it Prone (Condition)|Prone.

name: Flames of the Phoenix
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to cast Fireball as a class action.
description: Shoot a bright flame from your fingers that explodes upon contact, torching everything in the vicinity

name: Force Tunnel
summary: Force Tunnel is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to charge forward and knock back all enemies in their path.
description:
Charge forward, pushing all objects and creatures in your path 4 m / 13 ft away from you.

Doesn't provoke Opportunity Attacks.
notes:
* Does not affect allies
* Enemies and objects are pushed back 4 m / 13 ft (No SavingThrow)

name: Frost Breath
summary: Frost Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a cone of damaging cold energy in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of ice.

name: Garrotte
summary: Garrotte is an Action granted by Bhaalist Gloves that allows the user to wrap a rope around a target Humanoid's throat, dealing damage and Silencing it.
description: Wraps a shadow rope around a Humanoid creature's throat to start Garrotted|Garrotting it.

name: Giant Form
summary: Giant Form is a Class Action granted by Balduran's Giantslayer that can be used once per Short Rest.
description: Grow to a fearsome size. Your weapons deal an additional 1d6 damage and you gain 27 temporary hit points and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.
notes: * Secondary condition Gigantic Endurance is also added to the character and is responsible for the 27 Temp HP. Temporary Hit Points last until Long Rest.

name: Gong of the Summit
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows Way of the Four Elements to cast a monk version of the spell Shatter.
description: Damages all nearby creatures and objects. Creatures made of inorganic material such as stone have Disadvantage on their SavingThrow.

name: Gore (Minotaur)
summary: Gore is a class action used by Minotaurs. It deals 2d10+4|Piercing damage and pushes a foe back 2m.
description: Impale a target and push it back 2m.

name: Hand Me My Leech
summary: Hand Me My Leech is a Class Action used by Sister Geanne that allows Malus Thorm to cast Lethal Leech. In order to use this action, Malus Thorm must use Request Surgical Instrument on her first.
description: Equips the Surgeon with a bloated, biting leech, allowing him to ecast Lethal Leech|Leech|.

name: Hand Me My Saw
summary: Hand Me My Saw is a Class Action used by Sister Hunna that allows Malus Thorm to cast Bloody Bonesaw. In order to use this action, Malus Thorm must use Request Surgical Instrument on her first.
description: Equips the Surgeon with a gory, jagged bonesaw, allowing him to cast Bloody Bonesaw.

name: Hand Me My Syringe
summary: Hand Me My Syringe is a Class Action used by Sister Anya that allows Malus Thorm to cast This Won't Hurt A Bit. In order to use this action, Malus Thorm must use Request Surgical Instrument on her first.
description: Equips the Surgeon with a crusty, rusted syringe, allowing him to cast This Won't Hurt A Bit.

name: Hand Me My Trepan
summary: Hand Me My Trepan is a Class Action used by Sister Vanessa that allows Malus Thorm to cast Terror Trepan. In order to use this action, Malus Thorm must use Request Surgical Instrument on her first.
description: Equips the Surgeon with a poisonous trepan, allowing him to cast Terror Trepan.

name: Hide in Plain Sight
summary: Hide in Plain Sight is a Ranger class action that makes you Invisible and gives a +10 bonus to Checks as long as you stand still.
description: Camouflage yourself with your environment to become Invisible and gain a +10 bonus on Stealth Checks, as long as you stand still.

name: Hypnotic Gaze
summary: Hypnotic Gaze is an Enchantment Class Action that attempts to Incapacitate a creature. You can maintain your gaze to keep it going
description:
Charmed|Charm and Incapacitated|Incapacitates a creature. It cannot attack you. It cannot act.

You can Maintain Hypnotic Gaze your Hypnotic Gaze each turn to extend its duration.

name: Icy Regurgitation
summary: Icy Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Cold Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit ice that can Chilled|Chill those it hits.

name: Illusory Copy
summary: Illusory Copy is a class action available to Displacer Beasts that allows a creature to create an illusory copy of themself to attack nearby enemies.
description:
Available only in combat.

Create an illusory displacer beast to attack nearby enemies.

name: Improved Divine Smite
summary: Improved Divine Smite is a class action available to Paladins that adds extra damage to all of their weapon strikes. This damage stacks with all other sources.
description:
Your attacks are suffused with divine might. 
Melee weapon attacks deal an additional 1d8|Radiant damage.

name: Inciting Howl
summary:
Inciting Howl is an action available to Wildhearts with the Rage: Wolf Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to increase their allies' movement speed.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description: Each ally within earshot can move an additional 3 m / 10 ft during their next turn.

name: Infernal Dagger
summary: Infernal Dagger is an Action that Yurgir uses, to deal damage and Poison the target.
description: Strike a fiendish blow that might Poison the target and deal an additional 4d10|Poison damage.

name: Infiltration Expertise
summary: Infiltration Expertise lets Assassins adopt the identity of a male or female of any humanoid race, though the type is selected the actual appearance is random. It is similar to the spell Disguise Self.
description: Adopt a new identity, changing your appearance.

name: Intimidating Presence
summary: Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian instill fear into their enemies.
description:
Menace an enemy and instill a terrible Frightened|Fear within them.

You can use Maintain Intimidating Presence to prolong the targets fear.

name: Invoke Duplicity
summary: Invoke Duplicity is a Trickery Domain Action. This ability allows a Cleric to summon an illusory duplicate of themselves that improves the hit chances of allied creatures against nearby enemies.
description: Summon an illusion to distract your enemies. You and your allies receive Advantage on Attack Rolls against a creature if both the attacker and the illusion are within 3m / 10ft of it.

name: Ki Resonation: Punch (Action)
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand action that allows you to punch a target, activating the Ki within them. You can then detonate this Ki to cause an explosion.
description:
Hit a creature with your bare fists, making the ki in its body Resonating Ki|Resonate with yours.

You can then make this ki explode with Ki Resonation: Blast.

name: Lay on Hands
summary: Lay on Hands is a Paladin Action. This ability allows the Paladin to heal a creature or cure it of diseases and poisons.
description:
Use your blessed touch to heal a creature or cure it of all diseases and poisons.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Lay on Hands: Cure
summary: Lay on Hands: Cure is a variant of the Paladin Action Lay on Hands. This ability allows the Paladin to cure a creature of diseases and poisons.
description:
Imbue your hands with divine power to cure all diseases and poisons affecting a creature.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Lay on Hands: Greater Healing
summary: Lay on Hands: Greater Healing is a variant of the Paladin Action Lay on Hands. This ability allows the Paladin to heal a creature with a touch, expending an extra layonh for a larger heal.
description:
Imbue your hands with divine power to heal an ally.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Lay on Hands: Lesser Healing
summary: Lay on Hands: Lesser Healing is a variant of the Paladin Action Lay on Hands. This ability allows the Paladin to heal a creature with a touch.
description:
Imbue your hands with divine power to heal an ally.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Lethal Leech
summary: Lethal Leech is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to pierce his target hundreds of times, dealing  damage and making them Bleeding|Bleed.
description: Suckle a foe with hundreds of piercing teetch, making them Bleeding|Bleed.

name: Life Drain
summary: Life Drain is a class action available to 2d8|Necrotic}} damage and kills a target if their [[hit points reach zero.
description: Possibly drain a target's hit point by 2d8. The target dies if its hit points are reduced to 0.

name: Lightning Aura
summary: Lightning Aura is a special Class Action that allows the user to activate a lightning aura that deals damage to enemies on their turn and prevents reactions.
description: Consume 3 Lightning Charges and release a blast of electricity that damages and Jolted|Jolts nearby enemies.

name: Lightning Breath
summary: Lightning Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of damaging lightning in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of lightning.

name: Lupine Slash
summary: Lupine Slash is an action available to the level 11 or higher Wolf companion from the Beast Master action Wolf Companion that deals damage in a cone from the Wolf's location.
description: Strike nearby targets within 3m using a spectral sword that appears between your jaws.

name: Maintain Intimidating Presence
summary: Maintain Intimidating Presence is a Berserker Action. This ability allows the Barbarian to continue to instill fear into their enemies.
description: Prolong the Frightened|Fear inflicted on a target by your Intimidating Presence

name: Matriarch's Call
summary: Matriarch's Call is a unique action available to the Phase Spider Matriarch. It lets her hatch a nearby clutch of eggs.
description: The spider matriarch calls on her brood, causing her nearby eggs to hatch.

name: Mind Screech
summary: Mind Screech is a Class Actions used by Malus Thorm's Nurses that allow them to attack their target's soul, confusing their target.
description: Wrench at a foe's soul and inflict Confused|Confusion

name: Mist Stance
summary: Way of the Four Elements equivalent of the level 3 Wizard spell Gaseous Form that can only target the caster.
description:
Transform into a tiny gas cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage.

The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength SavingThrows.

While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

name: Moan
summary: Moan is an action available to Cloaker Phantasms that lets them deal psychic damage and Frightened|Frighten enemies.
description:
Produce a piercing moan and Frighten nearby creatures.

No effect on aberrations.

name: Mobile Flourish (Melee)
summary: Mobile Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a melee weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

name: Mobile Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Mobile Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to a target with a ranged weapon, sending them flying backwards. Afterwards, you can teleport next to them.
description: Thrust your weapon with enough force to push your target back m=6|ft=20. Afterwards, you can Mobile Flourish: Teleport|Teleport to the target.

name: Moonmote
summary: Moonmote is a Class Action granted by the Selûne's Spear of Night. This ability decreases enemy movement arround you and gives you and your allies extra Radiant damage.
description:
Illuminate the area around you with wisps of moonish light that make movement difficult for enemies and bolster your allies' damage.

At the start of their turn, each hostile creature within the light must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or they must treat the lighted area as Difficult Terrain. Each ally within the light deals an additiona 1d4|Radiant damage on a hit with melee attacks.

name: Multiattack (Cloaker)
summary: Multiattack is an action available to Cloakers, that allows them to deal damage twice.
description: Aim multiple attacks at a target that cause Gaping Wounds and Bleeding.

name: Natural Recovery
summary: Natural Recovery is a Spell Slots once per day.
description:
Available only out of combat.

Once per day while out of combat, you can replenish expended Spell Slots.

name: Nature's Wrath
summary: Nature's Wrath is an Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows the Paladin to root an enemy in place, leaving their guard open to attacks.
description: Invoke primaeval forces to restrain an enemy.

name: On Black Wings
summary: On Black Wings is an action available to the level 11 or higher Dire Raven Companion from the Beast Master  that summons another two uncontrollable ravens to fight alongside your current Raven companion.
description: Summons two ravens allied to you. You cannot control the ravens.

name: One with Shadows (Class Action)
summary: One with Shadows is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows to stand still, and vanish into the darkness.
description: Vanish into the darkness and become One with the Shadows (Condition)|Invisible, as long as you stand still.

name: Orb of Negation
summary: Orb of Negation is an action available to The Netherbrain. It creates several floating orbs which will deal  20~200|Force damage to everything within range at the end of the next round.
description: The Grand Design cannot be disrupted - manifest an orb of Netherese arcana that explodes on its turn, obliterating everything within range.

name: Pact of the Blade
summary: Pact of the Blade is a class action available to Warlocks that choose Pact of the Blade at level 3. This is for summoning a new weapon - if you want to bind to an existing weapon use Bind Pact Weapon.
description:
Summon a weapon to your hand. It uses the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier, and its damage is magical.

You are Proficient with the weapon. You can only have one at a time. The weapon disappears if you are more than 1.5m away from it for more than 10 rounds.

name: Paralysing Ray
summary: Paralysing Ray is a class action available to Paralyse a target.
description: Shoot an eye ray that Paralysed|Paralyses its target.

name: Phalar Aluve: Melody
summary: Phalar Aluve: Melody is a Class Action granted by the Phalar Aluve. You can choose to make the sword Sing or Shriek for 5 turns after which you must Short Rest to use this ability again.
description: The sword hums in anticipation, ready to Phalar Aluve: Sing or Phalar Aluve: Shriek.

name: Phalar Aluve: Shriek
summary: Phalar Aluve: Shriek is a Class Action granted by the Phalar Aluve. It is a variant of Phalar Aluve: Melody. The sword penalizes your enemies' mental Saving Throws, and causes you to deal extra Thunder damage whenever you hit it with this weapon.
description:
The sword Shrieks. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 of range have a 1d4 penalty to Charisma, Wisdom and Intelligence SavingThrows. Affected creatures receive an extra 1d4|Thunder damage.

The sword will stop singing if unequipped.

name: Phalar Aluve: Sing
summary: Phalar Aluve: Sing is a Class Action granted by the Phalar Aluve. It is a variant of Phalar Aluve: Melody. The sword boosts your allies mental defenses and gives them a bonus to their Attack Rolls.
description:
The sword sings a melody. All allies within m=6|ft=20 of range have a 1d4 bonus to Attack Rolls and Charisma, Wisdom, and Intelligence Saving Throws.

The sword will stop singing if unequipped.

name: Phantasms
summary: Phantasms is an action available to Cloakers that lets them summon up to three illusory duplicates per battle.
description:
Fill the shadows with three illusory duplicates of yourself that can hurt and Frightened|Frighten creatures with their haunting Moans.


Costs  movement | m = 15 | ft =

name: Poison Breath
summary: Poison Breath is a Dragonborn racial action. This ability allows them to breathe a column of poisonous breath in a target direction.
description: Spew forth a cone of poison.

name: Polymorph: Dire Raven
summary: Polymorph: Dire Raven is a Class Action granted by Corvid Token that transforms you into a Dire Raven once per Long Rest.
description: Take the shape of a dire raven that can avoid attention and Blinded|Blind enemies. It has 13|Healing.

name: Potent Concentrated Blast
summary: Potent Concentrated Blast is an Action and 9d6|Psychic}} damage to an enemy. If the target is [[Concentration|concentrating on a spell, the caster is healed for an amount equal to the damage dealt.
description: Blast a creature with sapping psychic energy. If the target was concentrating on a spell, you heal equal to the damage dealt.

name: Preserve Life
summary: Preserve Life is an Action available to Life Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to heal their allies.
description:
Evoke a healing energy that restores 3 x Cleric Level|Healing to allied creatures.

Has no effect on undead and constructs.

name: Radiance of the Dawn
summary: Radiance of the Dawn is a Light Domain Action. This ability allows the Cleric to channel divine power and deal Radiant damage to enemies.
description:
Harness the sun's divine power to dispel any magical darkness and deal 2d10 + Character Level|Radiant damage to hostile creatures.

On a successful save, targets still take half damage. Doesn't affect creatures that have total cover from you.

name: Reckless Attack
summary: Reckless Attack is a Barbarian class action that grants them Advantage on attacks but also granting enemies Advantage on attacks against them.
description:
Throw all caution in the wind to gain Advantage on your melee Attack Roll.

Until your next turn, you have Advantage on all Attack Rolls, but enemies also have Advantage on Attack Rolls against you.

name: Repulsor
summary: Repulsor is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows a character to damage and push back all creatures and objects in range.
description: Push anything and anyone back m=6|ft=30.

name: Request Surgical Instrument
summary: Request Surgical Instrument is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to ask one of his undead assistants for a surgical tool.
description:
Request a tool for advanced surgery.

Grants Surgeon's Chosen onto one of the undead nurses, having them lend a unique Instrument of Loss for him, allow Malus to perform powerful and debilitating attacks. The surgical tools are the following:

* Instrument of Loss: Bonesaw - Bloody Bonesaw
* Instrument of Loss: Syringe - This Won't Hurt A Bit
* Instrument of Loss: Trepan - Terror Trepan
* Instrument of Loss: Leech - Lethal Leech

name: Rotting Fist
summary: Rotting Fist is a class action available to Ancient Servants. It deals 2d6+3|Bludgeoning and 3d6|Necrotic damage, and possibly causes Mummy Rot.
description: Drive your fist into a foe and possibly afflict them with Mummy Rot.

name: Rotting Regurgitation
summary: Rotting Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Rotten Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit a necrotic fluid.

name: Rush of the Gale Spirits
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to conjure a squall to clear dangerous gasses or throw creatures back, potentially causing a dangerous fall. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Gust of Wind
description: Summon a strong wind that clears all clouds and pushes creatures back m=5|ft=17, forcing them Off Balance (Condition)|Off Balance.

name: Sacred Weapon
summary: Sacred Weapon is an Oath of Devotion Action. This ability allows them to channel positive energy into their weapon, adding their Charisma Modifier to their attack rolls.
description: Turn your weapon into a Sacred Weapon. It has a higher chance of hitting, and emits a bright light.

name: See Invisibility (Class Action)
summary: See Invisibility is an Illusion class action that lets you see Invisible creatures until Long Rest. The effect is similar to the spell See Invisibility (Spell)|See Invisibility.
description: Glimpse Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: Shadow Arts: Darkness
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to conjure a cloud of darkness in an area within range that obscures and Blinds those within it.
description: Create a cloud of magical darkness that Heavily Obscured|Heavily Obscures and Blinded|Blinds creatures within. Creatures cannot make ranged attacks into or out of it.

name: Shadow Arts: Darkvision
description: Grant a creature the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=12|ft=40.

name: Shadow Arts: Pass Without Trace
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to grants themselves and nearby allies a bonus to stealth. This action is the Monk's equivalent of the spell Pass Without Trace
description: Call forth a veil of shadow and silence that gives you and nearby allies a +10 bonus to Checks.

name: Shadow Arts: Silence
summary:
PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Action. This ability allows Monks to summon a sphere of absolute quietness in an area within range. Creatures within this sphere are immune to Thunder damage and cannot cast verbal spells.

:For the Level 2 spell, see {{SAI|Silence.}}
description: Create a sound-proof sphere. All within are Immune to Thunder damage.

name: Shadow Strike
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that lets you strike from the shadows dealing Psychic damage
description: Teleport to a foe from a hidden position, striking them with the creeping, psychic ferocity of the shadows themselves.

name: Shadow Strike: Unarmed
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow action that lets you strike from the shadows with your fists, dealing Psychic damage.
description: Teleport to a foe from a hidden position, striking them with the creeping, psychic ferocity of the shadows themselves.

name: Shadowjaw Bite
summary: Shadowjaw Bite is a unique action available to Doggy, which deals 2d6|Piercing damage and possibly knocks a target prone.
description: Sink your teeth into a target and possibly knock it Prone.

name: Shapechanger
summary: Shapechanger is a Transmutation action that allows you to transform into a Blue Jay at will, without expending any spell slots.
description:
Transform into a blue jay, able to Fly (Class Action)|Fly. 

If the blue jay's hit points drop to 0, the target reverts to its original form with its original hit points.

name: Shaping of the Ice
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to create an ice cube that can be climbed.
description: Create a climbable ice cube.

name: Shatter Psyche
summary: Shatter Psyche is an Action Action and Illithid Power. This ability continues the effects of Fracture Psyche but instead reduces Armour Class by 2 instead.
description:
Invade a target's mind and disrupt its defences. The target's Armour Class is reduced by 2.

If the target dies while its psyche is fractured, you can cast Shatter Psyche on another target.

name: Shield of Thralls
summary: Shield of Thralls is an Action and Volatile Shield}} condition to the character or an ally, granting them 10 [[Hit Points#Temporary Hit Points|temporary hit points. If the hit points are removed by incoming damage, all nearby enemies must make an INT or be Stunned for 1 turn. This ability can only be used once per short rest.
description:
Conjure a volatile shield around yourself or an ally, granting the target 10 temporary hit points.

If these temporary hit points are lost due to incoming damage, the shield bursts, possibly Stunning nearby foes.

Can only have temporary hit points from one source.

name: Slam
summary: Slam is an Prone.
description: Hit a target and possibly knock it Prone.

name: Slam (Greater Zombie)
summary: Slam is an class action available to Greater Zombies, that deals 3d6+4|Bludgeoning and 2d6|Necrotic damage.
description: Hit a target with your bare fists.

name: Slam (Zombie)
summary: Slam is an Action that allows the creature to hit a target and possibly infect it with the Crawling Gnaw, a disease that can spawn new zombies if the target dies.
description:
Hit a target with your bare fists and infect it with the Crawling Gnaw.

Constructs, elementals, oozes, plants, undead, and members of your adventuring party can't be infected.

name: Slashing Flourish (Melee)
summary: Slashing Flourish (Melee) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a melee weapon.
description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

name: Slashing Flourish (Ranged)
summary: Slashing Flourish (Ranged) is a College of Swords Action. This flourish manoeuvre allows the Bard to use a Bardic Inspiration to deal extra damage to two enemies with a ranged weapon.
description: Attack up to 2 enemies at once.

name: Sneak Attack (Melee)
summary:
Sneak Attack (Melee) is a Rogue Action. This ability allows the Rogue to exploit enemies' distraction and deal extra damage to their vulnerable spots with Melee Weapons. 

The weapon has to have the Finesse property (but can still utilize Strength if it is higher than Dexterity).

See also: Sneak Attack (Ranged)
description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to a foe you have Advantage against. You can also use Sneak Attack if you have an ally within 1.5m / 5ft of the target and you don't have Disadvantage.

name: Sneak Attack (Ranged)
summary:
Sneak Attack (Ranged) is a Rogue Action. This ability allows the Rogue to exploit enemies' distraction and deal extra damage to their vulnerable spots with Ranged Weapons.

See also: Sneak Attack (Melee)
description: Deal an extra 1d6 damage to a foe you have Advantage against. You can also use Sneak Attack if you have an ally within 1.5m / 5ft of the target and you don't have Disadvantage.

name: Song of Rest
summary: Song of Rest is an Action available to the Bard. This ability allows the Bard to restore their allies' strength by granting an additional Short Rest once per day.
description: Use your craft to soothe. You and your allies are revitalized as though you had taken a Short Rest.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to create a sphere that channels different elements. This action is the Monk's equivalent of Chromatic Orb.
description:
Hurl a sphere of energy.

It deals 3d8|Thunder damage, or 2d8 Acid, Cold, Fire, Lightning or Poison damage and creates a surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Acid
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a globe of acid, dealing Acid damage and creating an Acid Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Acid damage and creates an Acid Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Cold
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a globe of cold energy, dealing Cold damage and creating an Ice Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Cold damage and creates an Ice Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Fire
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of fire, dealing Fire damage and creating a Fire Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Fire damage and creates an Fire Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Lightning
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of electricity, dealing Lightning damage and creating an Electrified Surface.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 2d8|Lightning damage and creates an Electrified Surface.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Poison
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl an orb of poison, dealing Poison damage and creating a Poison Surface.
description: Hurl poisonous energy that damages the target and creates a bubbling surface to Poisoned (Condition)|Poison creatures.

name: Sphere of Elemental Balance: Thunder
summary: This action is a variant of Sphere of Elemental Balance. This variant allows Monks to hurl a ball of thunder, dealing Thunder damage.
description: Hurl a sphere of energy that deals 3d8|Thunder damage.

name: Spider Queen's Wrath
summary: Spider Queen's Wrath is an action available to the Phase Spider Matriarch. It gives her the condition Spider Queen's Wrath, which gives her an additional action per turn, +2 Strength and Resistance to physical damage.
description: Gain one additional attack per turn. Increase Strength by 2 and grant Resistance to physical damage.

name: Spiteful Suffering
summary: Spiteful Suffering is an Action available to those that have chosen the path of the Oathbreaker. This ability allows these Paladins to steep their enemies in darkness, causing necrotic damage and leaving them vulnerable to attacks.
description: Steep an enemy in the darkness that churns within you. The target takes 1d4 + Charisma Modifier|Necrotic damage each turn and Attack Rolls against it have Advantage.

name: Stage Fright
summary: Stage Fright is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to inflict a fear of failure on their enemies, causing them to miss more often and take psychic damage.
description:
Your targets have Disadvantage on Attack Rolls and take 2d6|Psychic damage each time they miss.

Targets overcome their Stage Fright early when they succeed on an Attack Roll.

name: Stunning Strike (Melee)
summary: Stunning Strike (Melee) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with Melee Weapons and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Weapon Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Stunning Strike (Unarmed)
summary: Stunning Strike (Unarmed) is a Monk Action. This Action allows the Monk to deal damage to enemies with an Unarmed Strike and possibly Stun them.
description: Spend a ki to deal Unarmed Damage and possibly Stunned|Stun the target.

name: Summon Companion
summary: Summon Companion is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Supreme Sneak
summary: Supreme Sneak is a Thief Action. This ability allows the Thieves to become invisible for a limited amount of time.
description: Blend into the environment so completely that you become Invisible.

name: Survival Instinct
summary: Survival Instinct is a special Action granted by completing the "Help Omeluum Investigate the Parasite" quest. This ability allows the character to save an ally from falling unconscious.
description: Infuse a creature with psionic force. If it reaches 0 Hit Points, it heals instead of falling Unconscious.
notes: * In Early Access, this power was the special Illithid Power granted to Clerics. Instead, the quest given by Omeleum would grant Repulsor.

name: Sweeping Attack
summary: Sweeping Attack is a Class Action using Superiority Dice available to Battle Masters
description: Swing your weapon in a rapid, sweeping arc to attack multiple enemies at once. Roll you superiority die for damage.

name: Sweeping Cinder Strike
summary: PAGENAME is an action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to shoot a flaming cone from their fingertips and deal Fire damage to enemies. This is the Monk's equivalent of Burning Hands.
description: Expel fire from your outstretched hands and ignite anything flammable.

name: Symbiotic Entity
summary:
Symbiotic Entity is a Circle of the Spores Action that consumes one Wild Shape Charge. It grants you temporary hit points, and until they're gone:
* your weapon and unarmed attacks deal additional Necrotic|necrotic damage, and
* you deal double damage with Halo of Spores.
description: Gain Healing|4 Temporary Hit Points per Druid level and deal an additional 1d6|Necrotic damage while you have them. Cast Halo of Spores with double damage.

name: Tentacle Whip (Displacer Beast)
summary: Tentacle Whip is a class action available to Displacer Beasts that allows a creature to deal 2d6 + Strength Modifier|Bludgeoning and 2d6|Piercing damage.
description: Lash out with a sleek, spinous tentacle.

name: Terror Trepan
summary: Terror Trepan is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to attack his target's brain, dealing damage and  Frightened|Frightening them.
description: Bore into a foe's brain and Frightened|Frighten them.

name: Third Eye: Darkvision
summary: Third Eye: Darkvision is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see in the darkness all the way up to m=27|ft=80 (akin to Superior Darkvision) until the next day.
description: You gain the ability to see in the dark out to a range of m=27|ft=80

name: Third Eye: See Invisibility
summary: Third Eye: See Invisibility is a Divination action that gives you the ability to see invisible creatures nearby until Long Rest. It is akin to the spell See Invisibility.
description: Become able to see Invisible creatures, and possibly reveal them to others.

name: This Won't Hurt A Bit
summary: This Won't Hurt A Bit is one of Malus Thorm's Class Actions that allows him to inject a target with a Syringe. He must have his assistant hand him the tool first.
description: Jab a foe with a syringe and Poisoned|Poison them.

name: Touch of the Storm
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows the Way of the Four Elements to strike nearby enemies with lightning, causing them to be unable to use reactions. This is the Monk's equivalent of Shocking Grasp.
description: The target cannot use reactions. This spell has Advantage on creatures with metal armour.

name: Transfuse Health
summary: Transfuse Health is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to heal a target by half the caster's current hit point value.
description: Sacrifice half your remaining hit points to heal a target for the same amount.

name: Turn the Faithless
summary: Turn the Faithless is an Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows the Paladin to make fey and fiends flee from them.
description:
Channel your Oath using ancient words to Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn the Unholy
summary: Turn the Unholy is an Action available to Oath of Devotion. This ability allows these Paladins to make Undead and Fiends(see notes) flee from them.
description:
Turned|Turn nearby fey and fiends. They are forced to flee and cannot come close to you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Turn Undead
summary: As an action, present your holy symbol and cause undead creatures to flee.
description:
Pray to Turn all undead that can see you.

The condition ends upon taking damage.

name: Umbral Shroud
summary: Umbral Shroud is a Gloom Stalker Action that lets you become Invisible so long as you are enshrouded in shadows.
description:
Area must be Lightly or Heavily Obscured

Wrap yourself in shadows to become Umbral Shroud (Condition)|Invisible if you are obscured.

Invisibility ends early if you attack, cast another spell, take an action, or take damage

name: Unpetrification Ray
summary: Unpetrification Ray is a class action available to Spectators, that allows them to turn a Petrified creature back to its organic form.
description: Turn a Petrified creature back to its organic form.

name: Unrelenting Ferocity
summary: Unrelenting Ferocity is an action available to Wildheart Barbarians with the Rage: Bear Heart bestial heart. This ability allows them to heal themselves while raging.
description:
Muster up your stamina to heal yourself.

Can only be used once per Rage.

name: Venomous Bite (Phase Spider)
summary: Venomous Discharge is an action available to the Phase Spider Matriarch that deals 2d6|Poison, 1d8|Piercing and possibly an additional 2d6|Poison damage as well as possibly Poisoned|poisoning the target.
description:
Bite a target and possibly Poison it.

Deals 2~12 Poison damage and 5~12 Piercing damage, and possibly injects a venom that deals 2~12 Poison damage.

name: Venomous Discharge
summary: Venomous Discharge is an action available to Phase Spiders that deals 2d6|Poison damage and possibly Poisoned|poisons the target.
description: Spit out a venomous substance and possibly Poison those it hits.

name: Venomous Regurgitation
summary: Venomous  Regurgitation is a action available to Thisobald Thorm while he has the condition Toxic Reflux.
description: A sip from the Brewer's special booze causes him to vomit a toxic fluid that can Poisoned|Poison those it hits.

name: Volatile Cluster
summary: Volatile Cluster is a class action available to Yurgir that allows him to toss Orthonic Handbombs at enemies and knock them Prone.
description: Toss a cluster of damaging explosives that can possibly knock nearby creatures Prone.

name: Water Whip
summary: PAGENAME is an Action that allows a Way of the Four Elements to either knock a target prone, or pull a target towards them.
description: Possibly pulls a target within 9m toward you or knocks it Prone.

name: Weapon Bond
summary: Weapon Bond is an Eldritch Knight action. This prevents the Fighter's main hand weapon from being disarmed and makes it automatically return to the Fighter when thrown.
description: Ritually bind the weapon in your main hand. The weapon can't be knocked out of your hand, and it automatically returns to you when Thrown.

name: Web (Phase Spider)
summary: Web is an action available to Phase Spiders that lets them create a Webbed surface, and possibly Enwebbed|Enwebs creatures within the area.
description: Expel a thick, flammable webbing that slows creatures and possibly Enwebs them.

name: Wholeness of Body
summary: PAGENAME is an action unique to Class Monk Open Hand Hotbar Icon|Way of the Open Hand, a subclass of Monk, that lets the monk regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus action.
description: Regain half your Ki and enter a temporary state of Wholeness of Body (Condition)|Wholeness where you regain Ki Points and have an extra bonus.

name: Wild Shape
summary:
Wild Shape is an Action gained by Druids at Level 2 that allows them to magically transform into various creatures in order to fight in combat or explore the environment.

See also: Combat Wild Shape, the Circle of the Moon enhanced version with extra exclusive forms.
description:
Magically assume the shape of a beast. While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast Spells.

You can take on the attributes your beast form -- excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 Hit Points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Badger
summary: Wild Shape: Badger is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a giant badger that can Burrow into the ground. The badger has a starting health of Healing|13 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Cat
summary: Wild Shape: Cat is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of a cat that can avoid attention and Meow to distract enemies. It has Healing|2 hit points.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Deep Rothé
summary: Wild Shape: Deep Rothé is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a deep rothé that casts Dancing Lights and Charges its enemies.  The deep rothé has a starting health of Healing|23 hit points that increase every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wild Shape: Dilophosaurus
summary: Wild Shape: Dilophosaurus is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description: Take the shape of a dilophosaurus whose Corrosive Spit can dissolve a target's Armour Class. Your dilophosaurus shape has a starting health of Healing|74 hit points.

name: Wild Shape: Owlbear
summary: Wild Shape: Owlbear is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of an Owlbear that can Rupture the ground and become Enrage.

Your owlbear shape has starting health of Healing|65 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

name: Wild Shape: Panther
summary: Wild Shape: Panther is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Take the shape of a panther that can Prowl around invisibly. 

Your panther shape has a starting health of Healing|45 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

name: Wild Shape: Spider
summary: Wild Shape: Spider is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of of a giant spider that can Enweb enemies. The giant spider has a starting health of Healing|20 hit points that increases every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

You are immune to Enweb, the movement penalty from walking on Webs, and take no falling damage when jumping onto Webs.

name: Wild Shape: Wolf
summary: Wild Shape: Wolf is a Wild Shape form available to Druids.
description:
Assume the shape of a dire wolf that can Incite enemies and Distract enemies. The dire wolf has a starting health of Healing|18 hit points that increase every two druid levels.

While in animal shape, you can't talk or cast spells. You take on the attributes of your beast form - excluding your Intelligence, Wisdom, and Charisma scores.

When your beast form drops to 0 hit points, you revert to your normal form.

name: Wolf Spider Companion
summary: Summon Companion: Wolf Spider is a variant of Summon Companion which is a Subclass Feature of Rangers learned immediately upon choosing the Beast Master subclass. This ability allows the Beast Master to call upon their animal companion to fight and aid them in combat.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Worg Companion
summary: Like the Summon Companion of the Worg Companion.
description: Gain a beast companion that accompanies you on your adventures and fights alongside you.

name: Wounding Ray (Class Action)
summary: Wounding Ray  is a class action used by Spectators. It allows them to shoot a ray which deals Necrotic damage.
description: Shoot an eye ray that deals immense damage.

name: Acolyte of Nature
summary: Acolyte of Nature is a Nature Domain feature. It allows Cleric to learn one of druid cantrips and get an additional proficiency.
description:
Learn one of the following cantrips: Poison Spray, Produce Flame, Shillelagh, Thorn Whip.

Get one of the following proficiencies: Animal Handling, Nature, Survival.

name: Action Surge
summary: Action Surge is a Free Action gained by Fighters at Level 2. This ability allows the Fighter to take another action in the same turn.
description:
Available only in combat.

Immediately gain an extra action to use this turn.

name: Advanced Unarmoured Movement
summary: Advanced Unarmoured Movement is a Monk passive feature that allows movement through Difficult Terrain without penality. If no shield is equipped, an additional m=6|ft=20 can be Jump (Bonus Action)|Jumped.
description: Difficult Terrain (Condition)|Difficult Terrain doesn't slow you down and you can Jump (Bonus Action)| Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump an additional m=6|ft=20 while you are not wearing shield.

name: Agonising Blast
summary: Agonising Blast is an Warlock}} class. It allows you to increase your damage by adding your Charisma [[Charisma Modifier.
description: When you cast Eldritch Blast, add your Charisma Modifier to the damage it deals, unless it is negative.

name: Arcane Ward
summary: Arcane Ward is a passive feature of the Abjuration. When you cast an Abjuration spell, you gain a charge in Arcane Ward that blocks incoming damage. Each time you take damage, the damage is reduced by the charge count and the charge count reduces by 1.
description:
The residual magic of your spells forms a ward around you that protects you from harm.

Each time you cast an Abjuration spell, the intensity of the ward increases by the amount of the spell's Level, up to a maximum of 2x your Wizard level.

Each time you take damage, the ward blocks an amount of damage equal to its intensity, and its intensity decreases by 1.

After each Long Rest, the ward's intensity resets, and becomes the same as your Wizard level.

name: Archery
summary: Archery is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: You gain a +2 bonus to Attack Rolls you make with ranged Weapons.

name: Armour of Shadows
summary: Armour of Shadows is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows you to cast Mage Armour at will.
description: You can cast Mage Armour on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot. Mage Armour increases your Armour Class when you are not wearing armour.

name: Ascendant Bite
summary: Ascendant Bite is a class action usable only by quest by ascending. Ascendant Bite behaves similarly to Vampire Bite, healing 6d6|Healing damage and dealing 6d6|Necrotic damage to the target.
description:
Suck the blood from a living creature to heal yourself.

If the target is humanoid, you become Happy and the target becomes Bloodless


Biting a creature does not break stealth.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Chimpanzee)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Chimpanzee) is a passive Wildheart Barbarian feature that infuses you with the nimble agility of a chimpanzee.
description:
The Aspect of the Chimpanzee grants you a nimble mischievousness.

You gain Resistance to Falling damage, and throwing camp supplies Blinds targets.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Crocodile)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Crocodile) is a passive Wildheart Barbarian feature that infuses you with the swimming agility of a crocodile.
description:
The Aspect of the Crocodile increases your agility in the water.

Your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10 while standing in water-based surfaces.

On slippery surfaces, you also have Advantage on Prone

name: Aspect of the Beast (Eagle)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Eagle) is a passive Wildheart Barbarian feature that infuses you with eyesight of an eagle.
description:
The Aspect of the Eagle enhances your eyesight.

You can see in the dark up to m=12|ft=40, and gain Advantage on Perception Checks.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Elk)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Elk) is a passive Wildheart Barbarian feature that infuses you with the agility of an elk.
description:
The Aspect of the Elk grants you astounding swiftness.

You can use Aspect of the Elk, giving yourself and nearby allies extra Movement Speed.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Honey Badger)
image: Aspect of the Beast Honey Badger.webp
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Honey Badger) is a passive Wildheart feature that infuses you with the resilience of a honey badger.
description: If you're Poisoned, Frightened, or Charmed at the start of your turn, you have a 50% chance to begin Raging without expending a Rage Charge.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Stallion)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Stallion) is a passive Wildheart feature that infuses you with the steadfastness of a horse.
description:
The Aspect of the Stallion creates safety in movement.

Dashing grants you temporary hit points equal to twice your Barbarian level.

Can only have temporary hit points from one source.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Tiger)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Tiger) is a passive Wildheart feature that infuses you with the ferociousness of a tiger.
description:
The Aspect of the Tiger infuses you with an unrelenting ferocity.

You add an additional Strength Modifier to Bleeding}} or Poisoned targets, and gain Proficiency in [[Survival

name: Aspect of the Beast (Wolf)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Wolf) is a passive Wildheart feature that infuses you with the stealthiness of a wolf.
description:
The Aspect of the Wolf boosts your stealthiness.

You gain Proficiency in Stealth, and can use Aspect of the Wolf.

name: Aspect of the Beast (Wolverine)
summary: Aspect of the Beast (Wolverine) is a passive Wildheart feature that infuses you with the relentlessness of a wolverine.
description:
The Aspect of the Wolverine grants you the tools to relentlessly pursue your prey.

When you attack a Bleeding or Poisoned target, you also Maimed|Maim it for 1 turn

name: Aspect of the Elk
summary: Aspect of the Elk is a free action gained by Wildheart Barbarians. This ability allows the Barbarian to grant increased movement speed to you and nearby allies.
description: Grant yourself and nearby allies a m=1.5|ft=5 bonus to Movement Speed

name: Aspect of the Wolf
summary: Aspect of the Wolf is a free action gained by Wildheart Barbarians. This ability allows the Barbarian to add his/her Dexterity modifier as a bonus to Stealth Checks.
description: You and nearby allies add your Dexterity modifier as a bonus to Stealth Checks.

name: Assassin's Alacrity
summary: Assassin's Alacrity is an Assassin passive feature that greatly enhances your first turn in combat
description: Quick as an alley cat in a rain-dark city, you immediately restore your action and bonus at the start of combat

name: Assassinate: Ambush
summary: Assassinate: Ambush is an Assassin passive feature that greatly increases damage against foes you surprise.
description: Any successful Surprised}} creature is a [[Critical Hit.

name: Assassinate: Initiative
summary: Assassinate: Initiative is an Assassin passive feature that increases the chance of a successful attack if you act before they do.
description: You are deadliest against unprepared enemies. In combat, you have Advantage on Attack Rolls against creatures that haven't taken a turn yet.

name: Bardic Inspiration
summary:
Bardic Inspiration is a Class Feature of a Bard. This ability allows a Bard to inspire their allies and influence the outcome of their rolls. The version at level 5 and onwards is called Improved Bardic Inspiration in the UI. 

See also: The College of Valour enhancement Combat Inspiration
See also: The College of Swords enhancement Blade Flourish
description: Inspire an ally to go beyond their capabilities with your performance. They can add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

name: Beast Speech
summary: Beast Speed is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows you to cast Speak with Animals at will.
description: You can cast Speak with Animals on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Beast Tamer
summary: Beast Tamer is a Ranger Passive Effect of Find Familiar}} and can cast it at will without using a [[Spell Slot.
description: You have cultivated a strong bond with animals. You can cast Find Familiar without expending a spell slot.

name: Beguiling Defences
summary: Beguiling Defences is a Archfey passive feature that makes the Warlock immune to charm.
description: You have built stoic barriers in your heart and mind, and cannot be Charmed.

name: Beguiling Influence
summary: Beguiling Influrence is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You gain the ability to invoke your patron's charm improve your Deception and Persuasion.
description: You invoke your patron's bewitching charm. You gain Proficiency in the Deception and Persuasion.

name: Bend Luck
summary: Bend Luck is a Wild Magic free action and reaction that grants a bonus or penalty to a target's Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.
description: Give a target a {{DieIcon|d4|Physical1d4}} bonus or penalty to an Attack Roll, D20|25 Ability Check, or SavingThrow.

name: Benign Transposition: Teleport
summary: Benign Transposition Teleport is a Conjuration action that you can use to teleport near or swap places with an ally. You can do this once per long rest.
description:
Teleport to a nearby, unoccupied space, or swap places with an ally.

Targets must be Medium or Small

name: Bestial Fury
summary: Bestial Fury is a Beast Master passive feature that enhances your companions by granting them the ability to make a second attack along with their first attack, similar to the Extra Attack class feature.
description: Grants all your companions an extra attack.

name: Bite (Vampire Spawn)
summary: Bite is a class action available to Vampire Spawn. It deals necrotic damage and blood-saps a target.
description:
Sink your fangs into a target and Blood-Sapped|Sap its blood.

Subsequent attacks that Sap blood will further reduce the target's maximum hit points.

name: Black Hole
summary: Black Hole is an Action and Slows them.
description:
Create a point of intense gravity that pulls in all nearby enemies and possibly Slows them. 

Five more black holes can be summoned after this spells initial casting.

Afterwards, you must Short Rest before casting it again.

name: Blessed Healer
summary: Blessed Healer' is a Life Domain  that heals the Cleric whenever it heals someone other than itself for 2 + the spell's level|Healing.
description:
Healing others heals you as well.

When you cast a healing spell of Level 1 or higher on another creature, you regain hit points equal to 2 + the spell's level|Healing.

name: Book of Ancient Secrets
summary: Book of Ancient Secrets is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You can inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows.
description:
You can inscribe magical rituals in your Book of Shadows. Gain Ray of Sickness, Chromatic Orb, and Silence spells.

You can cast them once per Long Rest and they don't expend spell slots

name: Bounty Hunter
summary: Bounty Hunter is a Ranger Passive Effect of Favoured Enemy. Your mastery at hunting bounties shines through. You gain proficiency in Investigation and enemies have Disadvantage on their saving throw vs Ensnaring Strike.
description: Gain Ensnaring Strike (Ranged)|Ensnaring Strike}} (either ranged or melee) have Disadvantage on their [[Saving Throw.

name: Brutal Critical
summary: Brutal Critical is a Barbarian Passive Feature. The barbarian makes their critical hits even deadlier.
description: You've trained to strike swift and true. When you land a Critical Hit, you roll an extra damage die as well as the normal additional critical die.

name: Brutal Leap
summary: Brutal Leap is a class action available to Minotaurs that allows them to leap and damage foes.
description: Leap at a target and possibly knock it Prone.

name: Claws (Crawling Claw)
summary: Claws is a class action available to Crawling Claws. It deals 2d8+1|Slashing damage.
description: Lash out with deadly claws.

name: Colossus Slayer
summary: Colossus Slayer is a Hunter Passive Feature. This ability allows these Rangers to deal extra damage to targets whose Hit Points are below the maximum value.
description: Once per turn, your weapon attack deals an extra 1d8|Physical|drs=t damage if the target is below its hit point maximum.

name: Combat Inspiration
summary:
Combat Inspiration is a Class Feature available to College of Valours. This ability is an enhanced version of Bardic Inspiration that adds the ability to increase the target's armour class and damage.

See also: Bardic Inspiration, the base ability available to non-Valour Bards
description: Inspire an ally to add a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical+1d6}} bonus to their next Attack Roll, Ability Check, Saving Throw, weapon damage, or Armour Class.

name: Combat Wild Shape
summary: Combat Wild Shape is a Circle of the Moon Druid Bonus Action that allows them to Wild Shape. They gain access to all base Druid Wild Shape forms as well as their own exclusive forms.
description:
As a Bonus Action, you can assume the form of a beast. You can transform twice per Short Rest.

This ability otherwise acts as Wild Shape.

name: Companion's Bond
summary: Companion's Bond is a Beast Master passive feature that enhances your companion.
description: Your Summoned Companions receive a bonus to Armour Class, damage, and Attack Rolls (even though this is not stated) equal to your ProficiencyBonus.

name: Controlled Chaos
summary: Controlled Chaos is a Wild Magic reaction that triggers a Wild Magic effect after a nearby spellcaster casts a Spell
description: Induce a Wild Magic (Subclass Feature)|Wild Magic on the nearby spellcaster.

name: Corpulent Rage
summary: Corpulent Rage is a class action used by Flesh. When its health reaches a certain threshold, this action makes it go Berserk.
description: As your health diminishes, let out a bone-quaking roar that pushes back anyone near you, and go Berserk.

name: Countercharm
summary: Countercharm is an Action available to Bards. This ability allows a Bard to embolden their allies against Charming and Frightening effects.
description: You and any allies within m=9|ft=30 have Advantage on SavingThrows against being Charmed or Frightened.

name: Create Spell Slot
summary: Create Spell Slot is a Level 2 Sorcerer Bonus Action. This ability allows Sorcerers to channel their innate magic to create spell slots.
description: Spend Sorcery Points to unlock a Spell Slot. The conversion rate is listed in the table below.

name: Cunning Action: Dash
summary: Cunning Action: Dash is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their bonus action to double their movement speed.
description: Cover more distance this turn: double your movement speed.

name: Cunning Action: Disengage
summary: Cunning Action: Disengage is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their bonus action to disengage from enemies and avoid opportunity attack.
description: Retreat safely. Moving won't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Cunning Action: Hide
summary: Cunning Action: Hide is a Rogue Bonus Action. This ability allows Rogues to use their Bonus Action to Hide from view.
