description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Cutting Words
summary: Cutting Words is a Reaction available to the College of Lores. This ability allows these Bards to distract and confuse their foes, potentially causing attacks to miss, or ability checks or saving throws to fail.
description: Use your wit to distract a creature and sap its confidence. It receives a {{DieIcon|d6|Physical-1d6}} penalty to Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw.

name: Danger Sense
summary: Danger Sense is a Barbarian passive feature that gives you Advantage on Dexterity surfaces as long as you aren't Blinded or Incapacitated.
description:
You sense when things aren't as they should be. 

You have Advantage on Dexterity surfaces. 

To gain this benefit, you can't be Blinded or Incapacitated.

name: Dark One's Blessing
summary: Dark One's Blessing is a passive feature unique to the Fiend subclass that gives the Warlock temporary Hit Points when killing hostile creatures.
description: Whenever you reduce a hostile creature to 0 Charisma Modifier + [[Warlock Level}} temporary hit points.

name: Dark One's Own Luck
summary: Dark One's Own Luck is a Fiend}} subclass that adds 1d10 to an Ability Check every [[Short Rest.
description: Call on your patron to change your fate and add a {{DieIcon|d10|Physical1d10}} to an D20|25 Ability Check.

name: Deepened Pact
summary: Deepened Pact is a passive feature that grants Warlocks additional bonuses depending on their chosen Pact Boon.
description:
Pleased with your service, your otherworldly patron added new boons to the terms of your pact.
* Pact of the Blade: Gain an Extra Attack with your pact weapon.
* Pact of the Chain: Your familiar gains an Extra Attack.
* Pact of the Tome: You can cast Animate Dead, Haste, and Call Lightning once per Long Rest.

name: Defence
summary: Defence is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: You gain a +1 bonus to Armour Class while wearing Armour.

name: Deflect Missiles
summary: Deflect Missiles is a Reaction gained by Monk at Level 3. Deflect Missiles allows the Monk to reduce incoming damage from ranged weapon attacks and optionally return the projectile.
description: Use your reaction to reduce the damage from a ranged weapon attack by 1d10 + your Dexterity Modifier + your monk level. If the damage is reduced to 0, you use a Ki Point to Deflect the Missile.

name: Destroy Undead
summary: Destroy Undead is a Cleric Passive Feature that deals 4d6|Radiant damage to creatures affected by Turn Undead.
description: When you successfully Turned|Turn an Undead creature, it also takes 4d6|Radiant damage.

name: Destructive Wrath
summary: Destructive Wrath is a Reaction available to Tempest Domains. This ability allows these Clerics to deal maximum damage when dealing Thunder|Thunder or Lightning|Lightning damage.
description: When you roll Thunder or Lightning damage, you can use your Channel Divinity to deal maximum damage instead.

name: Devil's Sight
summary: Devil's Sight is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows the wearer to see through both natural and magical darkness.
description: You can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance ofm=24|ft=80.

name: Disciple of Life
summary: Disciple Of Life is a Life Domain Passive that makes all healing spells stronger.
description: Your devotion empowers your healing spell, the target regains additional hit points equal to  2 + the spell's level.

name: Divine Health
summary: Divine Health is a Paladin Passive Feature that makes them immune to disease.
description: The divine magic flowing within you prevents disease from affecting you.

name: Divine Intervention
summary: Divine Intervention is a Cleric one-time class action that can perform one of several large-scale actions.
description: Call upon your deity in your moment of greatest need. Once they interfere, your deity will never do so again in this manner.
notes:
A character cannot use Divine Intervention more than once, even by respecing. However, you can use respecing to get Divine Intervention a number of times equal to the number of characters you have available, since each character may use it once. Both Arm Thy Servant and Golden Generosity can be used outside of combat and the items they create stick around indefinitely (although, of course, the items created by Golden Generosity are consumable).

The items generated in the Bestowed Bounty are tied to each save. The first cast of Bestowed Bounty on a save will always give the same items, the second a different set, and so on. This means that save-scumming to get a better roll on the chest is not possible.

The base value of the Devotee's Mace, created by Arm Thy Servant, is 640 gold. It costs 200 gold to respec a character into a cleric, create the Devotee's Mace, and then change back (or to recruit a hireling and respec them into a cleric). You could use this as a source of cash, if you were somehow running low on funds at level 10.

Return to top

name: Divine Sense
summary: Divine Sense is a Paladin Action. This ability allows them to briefly gain advantage on attacks against certain enemies.
description: Tap into your spiritual awareness to gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against celestials, fiends, and undead.

name: Doppelganger (Class Action)
summary: Doppelganger is a class action used by Doppelgangers. This action allows a Doppelganger to transform into another creature.
description: Take the shape of a small or medium creature you've seen.

name: Draconic Resilience
summary: Draconic Resilience is a Draconic Bloodline passive feature that raises the Sorcerer's base Armour Class to 13 when not wearing armour.
description: Dragon-like scales cover parts of your skin. When you aren't wearing armour, your base ArmourClass is 13.

name: Draconic Resilience: Hit Points
image: Draconic Resilience Hit Points Icon Small.png
summary: Draconic Resilience: Hit Points is a Draconic Bloodline Sorcerer passive feature that increases the Sorcerer's Hit Points by 1 for every Sorcerer level they have.
description: Your Hit Point maximum increases by 1 for each Sorcerer level.

name: Dread Ambusher
summary: Dread Ambusher is a Gloom Stalker passive feature that makes you deadly on the first turn of combat.
description:
You specialise in taking out foes swiftly and ruthlessly.

You gain a +3 bonus to Initiative.

On the first turn of combat, your Movement Speed increases by m=3|ft=10, and you can make an attack that deals an additional d8|Physical1d8 damage

name: Dread Ambusher: Hide
summary: Dread Ambusher: Hide is a Gloom Stalker Bonus Action. This ability allows Gloom Stalkers to use their Bonus Action to Hiding (Condition)|Hide from view.
description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Dreadful Glare
summary: Dreadful Glare is a class action available to Ancient Servants. It possibly Frightened|Frightens a target.
description: Affix a target with your baleful gaze to Frighten it.

name: Dreadful Word
summary: Dreadful Word is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You learn how to cast Confusion.
description: You can cast Confusion with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Duelling
summary: Duelling is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: When you are wielding a melee weapon that is not Two-Handed or Versatile in one hand, and no weapon in the other, you deal an additional 2 damage with that weapon.You can carry a shield in your free hand and still gain this bonus.

name: Eldritch Strike
summary: Eldritch Strike is an Eldritch Knight Passive Feature. This allows the Fighter to force a creature to have Disadvantage on its next Saving Throw by a mere weapon attack.
description: When you hit a creature with a weapon attack, it has Disadvantage on its next Saving Throw against a spell you cast before the end of your next turn.

name: Elemental Affinity: Damage
summary: Elemental Affinity: Damage is a Draconic Bloodline Passive Feature that adds extra damage based on your Charisma Modifier to every spell you cast so long as it is the same type as your bloodline.
description: When you cast a spell that deals damage of the type associated with your draconic ancestry, you add your Modifier to the damage

name: Elemental Affinity: Resistance
summary: Elemental Affinity: Resistance is a Resistance to the element matching your Draconic Bloodline
description: When you cast a spell that deals damage matching your draconic ancestry, you can spend a sp|1 to gain Resistance to that damage type.

name: Empowered Evocation
summary: Empowered Evocation is an Evocation passive feature that increases the damage of your Evocation spells by your Intelligence modifier.
description: Your grasp of Evocation magic has tightened, and you can add your Intelligence Modifier to damage rolls with any Evocation spells.

name: Enraged Throw
summary: Enraged Throw is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a ranged attack using nearby items or creatures.
description:
Pick up an item or creature and throw it at a target, dealing additional damage and knocking it Prone.

Your Strength affects the additional damage and how much weight you can throw. Heavier items deal more damage.

The damage of weapons with the thrown property is the same as the weapon's melee damage.

Available only when Frenzied.

name: Entropic Ward
summary: Entropic Ward is a reaction unique to the Great Old One subclass.
description: Impose Disadvantage on an Attack Roll against you. If the attack misses, you gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll against the attacker for 1 turn.

name: Escape the Horde
summary: Escape the Horde is a Hunter Passive Feature that allow you to more safely escape the reach of an enemy.
description: Opportunity Attacks against you have Disadvantage.

name: Evasion
summary: Evasion is a Monk and Rogue passive feature that makes you receive less damage from spells or effects that require a Dexterity Saving Throw.
description: Your agility lets you dodge out of the way of certain spells. When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful Dexterity Saving Throw, it deals no damage if you succeed, and only half damage if you fail.

name: Evasive Footwork
summary: Evasive Footwork is a Battle Master Fighter free action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to impose Disadvantage on melee attacks made against it for a turn.
description: Evade attacks; enemies receive Disadvantage on melee attacks against you.

name: Exceptional Training
summary: Exceptional Training is a Beast Master passive feature that enhances your companion. They can now take several common actions as bonus actions.
description: Your summoned companions can now Dash, Disengage, and Help as a bonus.

name: Experimental Alchemy
summary: Experimental Alchemy is a Transmutation passive feature that enhances your mastery over alchemy. Whenever you combine extracts, you can brew two solutions instead of one provided you succeed a Medicine check.
description: You brew two Alchemical Solutions instead of one when combining extracts, if you succeed a Check.

name: Expert Divination
summary: Expert Divination is a Divination passive feature that enhances your Portent Dice and lets you complete a prophecy to regain expended an expended Portent Die.
description: You may gain an additional Portent Die: when taking a Short Rest you receive a Prophecy. Complete it to regain a missing Portent Die.

name: Expertise (Subclass Feature)
summary: Expertise is a passive feature that allows a character to double their Proficiency bonus on a Skill.
description: When a character gains this feature, they may choose two skills they are proficient in and gain expertise in both of those skills.

name: Extra Attack
summary: Extra Attack is a passive feature that allows you to make an additional attack when making an Attack Action.
description: You can make an additional free attack after making an unarmed or weapon attack.

name: Fast Hands
summary: Fast Hands is a Thief passive feature that grants an extra Bonus Action
description: You gain an extra bonus, which you can use with any of your existing Bonus Actions.

name: Fast Movement
summary: Fast Movement is a Barbarian passive feature that increases your Movement Speed by 3m / 10ft while not wearing Heavy Armour.
description: Your m=3|ft=10}} while not wearing [[Heavy Armour.

name: Feral Instinct
summary: Feral Instinct is a Barbarian Passive Feature. The barbarian is always ready for battle and can't be caught off-guard.
description:
You have honed your instincts to the utmost degree.

You gain a +3 to Initiative and can't be Surprised.

name: Fiendish Vigour
summary: Fiendish Vigor is an Warlock}} class. It allows the wearer protect themselves with extra [[Hit Points#Temporary Hit Points|Temporary Hit Points.
description: You can cast False Life on yourself at will as a 1st-level spell, without expending a Spell Slot. False Life grants you 7 Temporary Hit Points|Healing.

summary: PAGENAME is a bonus that allows the Monk to deal two unarmed strikes at their opponent. This skill does not have to come after an Attack or an action.
description: Punch twice in quick succession.

name: Flurry of Blows: Push
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to push your target away from you as well.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially push your target m=5|ft=16 away.

name: Flurry of Blows: Stagger
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to stagger your target as well, preventing reactions as long as it connects.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and Open Hand Technique: Staggered (Condition)|Stagger the target, making it unable to take Reactions.

name: Flurry of Blows: Topple
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that enhances your Flurry of Blows to knock your target prone.
description: Punch twice in quick succession and potentially knock the target Prone (Condition)|Prone.

name: Fly (Illithid Power)
summary:
Fly is an Action and Illithid Power that allows a character to fly to a target position using their Movement Speed.

It is unlocked automatically for characters who become Partial-Illithids.
description:
Fly to a target position.

Uses movement| and doesn't take an Action.
notes: * While it is supposed to replace the Jump action's keybinding, this interaction is unreliable and seems to be bugged.

name: Focused Conjuration
summary: Focused Conjuration is a Conjuration passive feature prevents you from losing concentration on Conjuration spells.
description: Damage taken while you are Concentrating on a Conjuration spell will not break your Concentration.

name: Font of Inspiration
summary: Font of Inspiration is a Bard Passive Feature that causes you to regain all of your Bardic Inspiration Charges after a Long or Short Rest.
description: You regain all of your bi|forceplural=yes after a Long or Short Rest.

name: Forced Manoeuvre
summary:
Forced Manoeuvre is a Battle Master Situational Action. This is a free action that increases the movement speed of an ally by 50% for a turn and prevents Opportunity Attacks.

See also: Manoeuvring Attack (Melee) and Manoeuvring Attack (Ranged), the actions that spur this Situational Action.
description: Increase an ally's movement speed by 50%. They don't provoke Opportunity Attacks.

name: Fracture Psyche
summary: Fracture Psyche is a Bonus Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows the character to reduce an enemy's Armour Class.
description:
Invade a target's mind and disrupt its defences. The target's Armour Class is reduced by 1.

If the target dies while its psyche is fractured, you can cast Shatter Psyche on another target.

name: Frenzied Strike
summary:
Frenzied Strike is a Berserker Bonus Action. This ability allows the Berserker to make a melee attack as a bonus action once per turn.

Looking for the Barbarian bonus action? See {{SAI|Rage.}}
description:
As a bonus action, make a melee attack with your equipped weapon.

* Will cause a stack of Frenzied Strain on the barbarian.
* Available only when Frenzied.

name: Frenzy
summary: Frenzy is a Berserker Bonus Action that is a superset of Rage. This ability turns the Berserker's anger into an uncontrollable fury and grants additional abilities in addition to those from Rage. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing some benefits of Frenzy.
description:
Available only in combat.

Your Rage turns into a frenzy! You gain Frenzied Strike and Enraged Throw. You can also make an Improvised Melee Weapon (Bonus Action)|Improvised Melee Weapon as a bonus action.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

name: Fungal Infestation
summary: Fungal Infestation is a reaction gained by Circle of the Sporess at Level 6 that allows them to raise a Fungal Zombie from a nearby corpse using a resource exclusive to this action.
description:
Raises a mildewed, mould-encrusted zombie from a corpse.

Target must be a beast or humanoid corpse.

name: Gather Power
summary: Gather Power is a unique Class Action available to Ansur that causes him to begin building up massive energy.
description: Take flight, land, and begin to gather power.

name: Giant Killer
summary: Giant Killer is a Hunter Passive Feature. This ability allows them to make a melee attack and deal damage to large targets using their reaction.
description:
If a Large or bigger creature attacks you, you can use your Reaction to retaliate with a melee attack.

Prerequisite: You must be able to see the creature, and it must be within 1.5m / 5ft of you.

name: Great Weapon Fighting
summary: Great Weapon Fighting is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: When you roll a 1 or 2 on a damage die for an attack with a Two-Handed melee weapon, that die is rerolled once.

name: Grim Harvest
summary: Grim Harvest is a Necromancy passive feature that allows you to regain hit points every time you kill a creature with a spell based on the Spell Slot used. This amount is increased if it's a Necromancy spell.
description: Once per turn, if you kill a creature with a spell, you regain Spell Slot level used - thrice if it's a Necromancy spell. Undead and Constructs are unaffected.

name: Halo of Spores
summary: Halo of Spores is a Circle of the Spores Reaction. It releases spores that deal Necrotic damage to a nearby target.
description: Unleash a cloud of necrotic spores upon a target. This uses a reaction, so other reactions won't trigger this turn.

name: Healing Radiance
damage: amounttext:Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier, type:Healing
summary: Healing Radiance is a Bonus Action available to Oath of the Ancients. This ability allows these Paladins to channel their oath to heal allies in an area.
description:
Heal yourself and all nearby allies for Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier hit points. Regain another Proficiency Bonus + Paladin Level + Charisma Modifier hit points next turn.

No effect on undead and constructs.

name: Heart of the Storm
summary: Heart of the Storm is a set two Storm Sorcery passives that create a storm that deals half your Sorcerer level, rounded down, when you cast a lightning or thunder spell.
description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Lightning or Thunder damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take  (Sorcerer Level / 2) | Lightning or  (Sorcerer Level / 2) | Thunder.

name: Heart of the Storm: Lightning
summary: Heart of the Storm: Lightning is a Storm Sorcery Sorcerer class reaction, part of Heart of the Storm, that creates a storm that deals half your Sorcerer level, rounded down, when you cast a lightning spell.
description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Lightning damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Lightning damage.

name: Heart of the Storm: Resistance
summary: Heart of the Storm: Resistance is a Storm Sorcery passive that gives you resistance to both Lightning and Thunder damage.
description: You are Resistant to Lightning and Thunder damage

name: Heart of the Storm: Thunder
summary: Heart of the Storm: Thunder is a Storm Sorcery Sorcerer class reaction, part of Heart of the Storm, that creates a storm that deals half your Sorcerer level, rounded down, when you cast a thunder spell.
description: When you cast a Spell of Level 1 or higher that deals Thunder damage, you cause a small, local storm. All enemies within m=6|ft=20 take (Sorcerer Level / 2)|Thunder damage.

name: Hellcrawler
summary: Hellcrawler is a Class Action granted by Helldusk Boots that teleports the user and deals Fire damage around where they land.
description: Teleport to an area and deal 2d8|Fire damage where you land. The impact blast spreads in a 3m / 10ft zone.

name: Holy Rebuke
summary: Holy Rebuke is an Action available to Oath of Devotion. This ability allows these Paladins to grant a target a vengeful aura that damages the attacker each time the target is hit in melee.
description: Call upon your Oath to grant a vengeful aura that deals 1d4|Radiant damage to anyone who hits them with a melee attack.

name: Horde Breaker
summary: Horde Breaker is a Hunter Passive Feature that grants you the ability to target two creatures next to each other.
description:
Target two creatures standing close to each other, attacking them in quick succession.

Grants:
* Horde Breaker (Melee)|w=40
* Horde Breaker (Ranged)|w=40

name: Illusory Self
summary: Illusory Self is an Illusion reaction that lets you substitute a duplicate image of yourself when receiving an attack, causing the attacker to miss.
description:
Interpose an illusory duplicate of yourself between you and an attacker's strike, making them miss their attack. 

You must Short Rest to use this feature again.

name: Improved Abjuration
summary: Improved Abjuration is a passive feature of the Abjuration. When you take a Short Rest, you can boost your Arcane Ward charges by your wizard level..
description: Each time you take a Short Rest, the intensity of your Arcane Ward increases by an amount equal to your wizard level.

name: Improved Combat Superiority
summary: Improved Combat Superiority is a Battle Master Passive Feature that increases the strength of their Maneuvers.
description: The size of your supdie increases to a d10|Physical d10

name: Improved Critical Hit
summary: Improved Critical Hit is a Champion passive feature that reduces the number they need to roll for a critical hit by 1.
description: The number you need to roll a Critical Hit while attacking is reduced by 1. This effect can stack.

name: Improved Elemental Casting
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Four Elements passive feature that improves the strength and damage of your Four Elements Spells.
description:
Your affinity with elemental ki deepens. Several of your offensive Four Elements features deal an additional dice of damage, your Clench of the North Wind can hold an additional creature, and your Embrace of the Inferno fires an extra ray.

* Fist of Four Thunders damage increases to 3d8|Thunder (from 2d8)
* Fist of Unbroken Air damage increases to 4d10|Bludgeoning (from 3d10)
* Sweeping Cinder Strike damage increases to 4d6|Fire (from 3d6)
* Touch of the Storm damage increases to 2d10|Lightning (from 1d10)
* Water Whip damage increases to 4d10|Thunder (from 3d10)
* Clench of the North Wind can hold an additional creature.
* Embrace of the Inferno fires an additional ray.
* Gong of the Summit damage increases to 4d8|Thunder (from 3d8)

name: Improved Extra Attack
summary: Improved Extra Attack is a Fighter Passive Feature that allows you to make 2 additional attacks when making an Attack Action.
description: You can make two additional attacks after attacking with your main-hand weapon.

name: Improved Minor Illusion
summary: Improved Minor Illusion is an Illusion feature that lets you cast Minor Illusion as a bonus.
description:
You can cast Minor Illusion as a bonus action. 

You can remain hidden while casting this spell.

This spell can be cast while you are Silenced

name: Improved Wild Strike
summary: Improved Wild Strike is a Druid Passive Feature that lets you make further multiple unarmed attacks while Wildshaped.
description: You can make 2 additional attacks after making an unarmed strike while in wildshape.

name: Improvised Melee Weapon (Bonus Action)
summary: Improvised Melee Weapon is a Berserker Action that allows the user to improvise an attack by picking up an item or creature off the ground using a bonus action. Can only be used when using while Frenzy|Raging.
description:
Pick up an item or creature and use it to make a melee attack.

Your Strength affects how much weight you can lift. Heavier items deal more damage.

name: Indomitable
summary: Indomitable is a Fighter Passive Feature that lets you reroll a failed Saving Throw.
description: Whenever you fail a Saving Throw, you can roll again, using the new result instead.

name: Inquisitor's Might
summary: Inquisitor's Might is a Bonus Action available to Oath of Vengeance. This ability allows these Paladins to grant a 2 turn single-target buff which causes their or their ally's weapon attacks to deal an additional +Charisma Radiant damage and can Dazed|Daze enemies for 1 turn.
description: You or an ally's weapon attacks deal an additional +Charisma Radiant damage and can Dazed|Daze enemies for 1 turn.

name: Instinctive Charm
summary: Instinctive Charm is an Enchantment reaction that Charms an attacker, redirecting the attack to someone else. If they succeed the WIS, they cannot be affected again until after a Long Rest.
description: Charmed (Condition)|Charm an enemy attacking you. They will attack a new target if possible as a reaction.

name: Inured to Undeath
summary: Inured to Undeath is a Necromancy passive feature that enhances your mastery over death. You become resistant to Necrotic damage and cannot have your maximum hit points reduced.
description: You have steeped yourself so completely in death that you are hit point maximum cannot be reduced.

name: Iron Mind
summary: Iron Mind is a Gloom Stalker passive feature that increases your defenses against certain mental attacks.
description: You gain Proficiency in Wisdom and Intelligence SavingThrows.

name: Jack of All Trades
summary: Jack of All Trades is a Bard passive feature that makes you add half your Ability Checks that you aren't Proficient in.
description: Your vast experiences make you more likely to succeed in any undertaking. Add half of your Ability Checks that you are not Proficient in.

name: Keeper of the Veil
summary: Keeper of the Veil is a Ranger Passive Effect of Favoured Enemy. You gain proficiency in Arcana and can cast the spell Protection from Evil and Good once per long rest.
description: You specialise in hunting creatures from other planes of existence. You gain Proficiency in Arcana and can grant protection against aberrations, celestials, elementals, fey, fiends, and undead.

name: Ki Resonation: Blast
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand free action that allows you to detonate the ki in anyone resonating with you. The explosion hits the creature and anyone nearby.
description:
Detonate the ki of a creature Resonating Ki|Resonating with you, hitting the creature and anyone within m=5|ft=16 of it.

The resulting explosion causes any nearby creatures Resonating with you to also detonate.

name: Ki Resonation: Punch (Bonus Action)
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand bonus action that allows you to punch a target, activating the Ki within them. You can then detonate this Ki to cause an explosion.
description:
Hit a creature with your bare fists, making the ki in its body Resonating Ki|Resonate with yours.

You can then make this ki explode with Ki Resonation: Blast.

name: Ki-Empowered Strikes
summary: Ki-Empowered Strikes is a Monk Passive Feature that allows unarmed attacks to count as magical while attacking enemies possessing Slashing|resistantResistance and Slashing|immuneImmunity to non-magical damage. In effect, unarmed attacks will ignore resistance and immunity to Slashing, Piercing, Bludgeoning non magical damage of the corresponding type .
description: Your unarmed attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming enemies' Resistance and Immunity to non-magical damage.

name: Land's Stride: Difficult Terrain
summary: Land's Stride is a passive feature that makes it so that you suffer no ill effects from traversing Difficult Terrain.
description: Difficult Terrain no longer slows you down.

name: Lifedrinker
summary: Lifedrinker is an Warlock}} class. Your melee attacks deal additional Damage Types|Necrotic|Necrotic damage equal to your [[Charisma modifier.
description: Add your Charisma modifier to the damage of your melee weapon attacks.

name: Lunar Mend
summary: Lunar Mend is a Circle of the Moon Bonus Action available while wildshaped. This ability allows the wildshaped Druid to heal themselves.
description:
Expend Spell Slots to regain Hit Points while wild shaped.

You regain 1d8|Healing per Spell Slot level.

name: Mage Breaker
summary: Mage Breaker is a Ranger Passive Effect of Favoured Enemy. You gain proficiency in Arcana and gain the True Strike cantrip.
description: You have a history of battling spellcasters. Gain True Strike}}, which gives you Advantage on Attack Rolls against a creature. [[Wisdom is your Spellcasting Ability for this spell.

name: Mage Hand Legerdemain
summary: Mage Hand Ledgerdemain is a Arcane Trickster Passive Feature. This ability enhances your Mage Hand, allowing it to carry out additional tasks.
description:
Your mage hand can stow away or retrieve objects carried by other creatures and use Thieves' Tools at range.
* There is no longer a time limit, and the Mage Hand lasts forever until destroyed or dismissed.
* The Mage Hand is now permanently Invisible.

name: Magic Awareness
summary: Magic Awareness is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. This ability gives bonuses to Saving Throws against spells.
description: Anyone within range adds their Proficiency Bonus to Saving Throws against spells.

name: Magical Ambush
summary: Magical Ambush is a togglable passive gained by Rogues at Level 9. Magical Ambush allows the Rogue to circumvent their target's defenses when casting spells while hidden.
description: While you are Hiding, your targets have Disadvantage on SavingThrows against your Spells.

name: Magical Secrets
summary: Magical Secrets is a level 10 Bard class feature in which they learn 2 Spells from a set belonging to other classes. College of Lores get Magical Secrets an additional time at level 6.
description:
Your versatile knack for the arcane lets you learn magic from every discipline. Choose some additional spells to add to your repertoire.

== Available Spells ==
Level 6 College of Lores are limited to level 3 Spells.

====Cantrips====
 style = column-width: 20em; list-style-type: none;
* Bone Chill|w=40
* Eldritch Blast|w=40
* Fire Bolt|w=40
* Ray of Frost|w=40
* Sacred Flame|w=40
div col end
