name: Manifestation of Body
summary: PAGENAME is a togglable passive feature unique to Way of the Open Hand at Level 6, that adds extra Necrotic damage based on your Wisdom Modifier to unarmed attacks.
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Necrotic damage.

name: Manifestation of Mind
summary: PAGENAME is a togglable passive feature unique to Way of the Open Hand at Level 6, that adds extra Psychic damage based on your Wisdom Modifier to unarmed attacks.
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Psychic damage.

name: Manifestation of Soul
summary: PAGENAME is a togglable passive feature unique to Way of the Open Hand at Level 6, that adds extra Radiant damage based on your Wisdom Modifier to unarmed attacks.
description: Your hands sap the ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional 1d4 + Wisdom Modifier|Radiant damage.

name: Martial Arts: Bonus Unarmed Strike
summary: Martial Arts: Bonus Unarmed Strike is a Monk passive feature that grants a single follow-up unarmed attack using a bonus. The initial attack must be unarmed or use a Monk Weapon.
description: After making an attack with a Monk Weapon or while unarmed, you can make another unarmed attack as a bonus action.

name: Martial Arts: Deft Strikes
summary: Martial Arts: Deft Strikes is a Monk passive feature that raises the minimum damage dealt with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks to 1d4|Bludgeoning.
description: Attacks with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks deal 1d4|Bludgeoning damage, unless their normal damage is higher.

name: Martial Arts: Dextrous Attacks
summary: Martial Arts: Dextrous Attacks is a Monk passive that makes attacks with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks to scale with Dexterity instead of Strength, if your Dexterity is higher.
description: Attacks with Monk Weapons and unarmed attacks scale with your Dexterity instead of your Strength if your Dexterity is higher.

name: Mask of Many Faces
summary: Mask of Many Faces is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows the wearer to repeatedly disguise themselves at will.
description: You can cast Disguise Self on yourself at will, without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Metamagic: Careful Spell
summary: Metamagic: Careful Spell is a Level 2 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to prevent harmful Spell effects affecting their allies.
description: Allies automatically succeed Saving Throws against spells that required them.

name: Metamagic: Distant Spell
summary: Metamagic: Distant Spell is a Level 2 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to increase the range of their Spells.
description: Increases the range of the spell by 50%. Spells with a range of m=1.5|ft=5 are increased to m=9|ft=30.

name: Metamagic: Extended Spell
summary: Metamagic: Extended Spell is a Level 2 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to extend the duration of magical effects caused by their Spells.
description: Double the duration of Conditions, summons, and surfaces caused by spells.

name: Metamagic: Heightened Spell
summary: Metamagic: Heightened Spell is a Level 3 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to empower the magical effects of their Spells, making it harder for targeted creatures to resist the spell.
description: Targets of spells that require Saving Throws have Disadvantage on their first Saving Throw.

name: Metamagic: Quickened Spell
summary: Metamagic: Quickened Spell is a Level 3 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to cast multiple Spells in a turn.
description: Spells that take an action take a bonus instead.

name: Metamagic: Subtle Spell
summary: Metamagic: Subtle Spell is a Level 3 Sorcerer Ability. This Metamagic ability allows Sorcerers to cast Spells without chanting or hand movements and allows them to ignore the Silenced condition. However, spells cast with Subtle Spell can still be countered by enemy casters using Counterspell.
description: You can cast spells while Silenced.

name: Metamagic: Twinned Spell
summary: Metamagic: Twinned Spell is one of several Metamagic abilities Sorcerers can learn at Level 2. This ability allows Sorcerers to target two creatures with certain Spells.
description:
Spells that only target 1 creature can target an additional creature.

Costs sp|1 per Spell Slot level used. Cantrips also cost sp|1.

For spells that don't shoot a projectile, the targets need to be close enough together.

name: Mind Blast
summary: A cone of psychic energy damages and stuns enemies.
description: Spew forth a conical wave of psychic energy and possibly Stunned|Stun targets within.

name: Mind Sanctuary
summary: Mind Sanctuary is an Action and Illithid Power. This ability creates a magical nexus that allows those within to take actions and bonus actions interchangeably.
description: Sculpt a magical nexus that allows those within to take actions and bonus actions interchangeably.

name: Mindless Rage
summary: Mindless Rage is a Berserker Passive Feature. While raging, these barbarians cannot be Charmed or Frightened.
description:
Your rage becomes all-consuming, repelling outside influence.

While Frenzied, you can't be Charmed or Frightened, and Calm Emotions no longer ends your rage.

name: Minions of Chaos
summary: Minions of Chaos is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You can cast Conjure Elemental with a Warlock spell slot.
description: You can cast Conjure Elemental with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Minor Conjuration: Create Water
summary: This spell is a special class version of Create or Destroy Water that also allows the Conjuration to conjure an area of water once per short rest. This action is equivalent to the level 1 version, but doesn't consume spell slots and can't be upcasted.
description: Call forth rain. It extinguishes exposed flames and forms a Water Surface.

name: Mire the Mind
summary: Sign of Ill Omen is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You learn how to cast Slow on enemies.
description: You can cast Slow with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Misty Escape
summary: Misty Escape is an Archfey passive feature that allows you to become Invisible upon taking damage.
description: Upon taking damage, become Invisible. On your next turn, you can cast Misty Step, though this will break your invisibility.
notes: * Prior to patch 3, this interrupted the current concentration spell when it activated.

name: Misty Escape (Vampire Ascendant)
summary: Misty Escape is a class action usable only by quest by ascending. It allows him to transform into a cloud which can fit thorough small openings, and has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws.
description:
Transform into a tiny mist cloud. It can't fall, and fits through small openings. It is very hard to damage.


The cloud has Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity and Strength Saving Throws.

name: Mobile Flourish: Teleport
summary: Mobile Flourish: Teleport is a College of Swords free action that only appears after you use Mobile Flourish. It allows you to teleport to the target you just hit.
description: Teleport to the target you hit with your Mobile Flourish (Mobile Flourish (Melee)|melee or Mobile Flourish (Ranged)|ranged).

name: Morphic Ambush
summary: Morphic Ambush is a class action used by Ambush their foes.
description: Ungergo a shocking transformation to startle your foes. Successfully Ambushed entities are more susceptible to your attacks.

name: Mortal Reminder
summary: Mortal Reminder is a passive feature unique to the Great Old One subclass that Frightened (Condition)|Frightens creatures upon a critical hit.
description: When you land a Critical Hit against a creature, that creature and any nearby enemies must succeed a Wisdom Saving Throw or become Frightened until the end of their next turn.

name: Multiattack (Ansur)
summary: Multiattack is an Ansur Action that allows him to hit an enemy very hard, with different appendages of his body.
description: Ravage your foes with claws and rotted draconic fangs.

name: Multiattack Defense
summary: Multiattack Defence is a Hunter Passive Feature that strengthens your defenses against enemies that can attack more than once per turn.
description: When a enemy attacks you, they suffer -4 penalty to additional Attack Rolls against you until start of their next turn.

name: Nature's Ward
summary: Nature's Ward is a Circle of the Land Passive Feature that grants immunity to Charm and Frighten effects from elementals and fey creatures. The Druid also becomes immune to Disease and Poison.
description: You can't be Charmed or Frightened by elementals and fey. Disease and poison also no longer affect you.

name: Necrotic Bite
summary: Necrotic Bite is a Class Action available to Necrotic Rats.
description: Bite a target.

name: Needle Burst
summary: Needle Burst is a class action used by Shadow-Cursed Needle Blight when they die.

name: One with Shadows
summary: One with Shadows is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. It allows you to vanish into the darkness and become One with the Shadows (Condition)|Invisible.
description: You learn how to cast One with Shadows (Class Action)|One with Shadows.

name: Otherworldly Leap
summary: Otherworldly Leap is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You can cast the Enhance Leap spell without expending a Spell Slot.
description: You can cast Enhance Leap as a ritual spell out-of-combat, but it does expend a Warlock slot to cast in turn-based mode.As of 4.1.1.3748643. This may be a bug.

name: Pact Boon
summary: Pact Boon is a passive feature that grants you abilities depending on your choice of Boon.
description:
Your otherworldly patron bestows a gift upon you for your loyal service. You gain one of the following features of your choice:

==== Pact of the Chain|w=40====

Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes a form you choose. This can be an animal, imp, or quasit.
* Find Familiar|w=40
* Find Familiar: Imp|w=40
* Find Familiar: Quasit|w=40

==== Pact of the Blade (Passive Feature)|Pact of the Blade|w=40 ====
You can Summon a pact weapon, or Bind the one you are wielding, making it magical.
Pact weapons use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity.

* Pact of the Blade|w=40
* Bind Pact Weapon|w=40

==== Pact of the Tome|w=40 ====
Your patron grants you a grimoire called 'The Book of Shadows', which allows you to cast several spells.

* Guidance|w=40
* Vicious Mockery|w=40
* Thorn Whip|w=40.

name: Pact of the Blade (Passive Feature)
image: Pact of the Blade Passive Feature.webp
summary: Pact of the Blade is a Pact Boon granted by the Warlock class. It allows a Warlock to specialise in melee combat by using a special Pact Weapon, granting two actions for this purpose.
description:
You can Pact of the Blade|Summon a pact weapon, or Bind Pact Weapon|Bind the one you are wielding as one, making it magical.

Pact weapons use the wielder's Spellcasting Ability Modifier instead of Strength or Dexterity.

name: Pact of the Chain
summary: Pact of the Chain is a Pact Boon from the Warlock class.
description:
Gain the service of a familiar, a fey spirit that takes a form of your choosing. This can be an animal, imp, or quasit.

Grants:
* Find Familiar|w=40
* Find Familiar: Imp|w=40
* Find Familiar: Quasit|w=40

name: Pact of the Tome
summary: Pact of the Tome is a Pact Boon from the Warlock class. You receive a book that allows you to case several spells.
description: Your patron grants you a grimoire called "The Book of Shadows", which allows you to cast Guidance, Vicious Mockery, and Thorn Whip.

name: Patient Defence
summary: Patient Defence is a Monk Bonus Action that allows the Monk to steel their bodies against incoming attacks.
description: Attack Rolls against you have Disadvantage, and you have Advantage on DEX.

name: Perilous Stakes
summary: Perilous Stakes is a Bonus Action and Illithid Power. This ability allows a character to inflict Perilous Stakes on a target.
description: Invest a creature with power that heals it when it attacks, but also makes it Vulnerable to all damage.

name: Portent
summary: Portent is a Divination feature that offers you glimpses into the future. You gain two random Portent Dice that you can use as a Reaction to substitute into any Attack Roll or Saving Throw rolled near you.
description:
Your dreams grant you glimpses that let you influence the future.

After each Long Rest, you gain two random Portent Dice. During the day, you can use your reaction to change the die of any Attack Roll or Saving Throw rolled near you to one of your Portent Dice.

Each Portent Die can only be used once, and you lose your unused Portent Dice at the end of the day.

name: Potent Cantrip
summary: Potent Cantrip is an Evocation passive feature increases the reliability of your damaging Cantrips such that even a miss hurts your target.
description:
Your cantrips become harder to evade entirely.

When a creature succeeds its SavingThrow against one of your cantrips, it still takes half the cantrip's damage, but suffers no additional effects.

name: Precision Attack
summary: Precision Attack is a Battle Master Fighter Action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to increase an attack roll for a higher chance of hitting an opponent.
description: Your can spend a Superiority Die to add it to a result to an Attack Roll.

name: Primal Strike
summary: Primal Strike is a Circle of the Moon class passive that makes their beast form attacks count as magical damage.
description: While in beast form, your attacks count as magical for the purpose of overcoming Immunity to non-magical damage.

name: Projected Ward
summary: Projected Ward is a reaction feature of the Abjuration. When a nearby ally takes damage, you can use a charge of your Arcane Ward to reduce the damage.
description: When a nearby ally takes damage and you have an active Arcane Ward, you can sacrifice your ward to reduce the damage they take.

name: Protection
summary: Protection is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: When you have a Shield, impose Disadvantage on an enemy who attacks one of your allies when you are within melee. You must be able to see the enemy.

name: Psionic Overload
summary: Psionic Overload is an Action and Illithid Power. When used, this ability applies the Overloaded With Synaptic Power condition to the character, which adds an additional 1d4|Psychic damage to each of the character's attacks for the next 10 turns, but also deals 1d4|Psychic damage to the character at the end of their turn. This ability can only be used once per short rest.
description: Your attacks deal an additional 1d4|Psychic damage, but you take 1d4|Psychic damage every turn.

name: Purity of Body
summary: Purity of Body is a Monk passive feature that gives  Poison immunity to Poison damage and to being Poisoned, and makes disease have no effect.
description: You are Immune to Poison damage and can't be Poisoned or affected by disease thanks to the purifying ki flowing through your meridians.

name: Rage
summary:
Rage is a Barbarian Bonus Action and Class Feature. Enter a Rage to gain Resistance against physical damage, deal extra melee and thrown damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws. Wearing Heavy Armour triggers the Rage Impeded Condition, removing most benefits of Rage.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description:
Available only in combat.

While Raging, you are stronger, and you deal 2 extra damage with melee and improvised weapons, and when throwing objects.

You have Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

name: Rage (Boar)
summary:
Rage (Boar) is a bonus action gained by the Beast Master Boar Companion at level 5. Go into a frenzy, increasing your size and becoming stronger through raw anger.
Looking for the Barbarian bonus action? See Rage.
description:
Available only in combat.

Go into a frenzy, increasing your size and becoming stronger through raw anger.

While raging, your melee attacks deal an additional 2 Slashing damage|Physical.

You gain Resistance to physical damage, and Advantage on Strength Checks and Saving Throws.

You can use Frenzied Strike (Boar)|w=40

Rage ends early if you don't attack an enemy or take damage each turn.

You can't cast or concentrate on spells while raging.

name: Rage: Bear Heart
summary:
Rage: Bear Heart  is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their bear-like anger to gain resistance against all types of damage (except psychic) and deal extra melee damage to enemies.

This page is for the Barbarian action. For the Beast Master companion action see {{SAI|Rage (Boar).}}
description:
Go into a Rage that makes you tough enough to stand up to any punishment.

You can use Unrelenting Ferocity, and have Resistance to all damage types except psychic damage.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Eagle Heart
summary: Rage: Eagle Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their eagle-like anger to become hard to hit and gain the ability to attack enemies from the sky.
description:
Go into a Rage that makes you near untouchable. You can use Diving Strike.

Foes also have Disadvantage on Opportunity Attacks against you, and you can use Dash Bonus Action|Dash as a bonus action.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Elk Heart
summary: Rage: Elk  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their elk-like anger to increase their movement speed.
description:
Go into a Rage that grants you extraordinary swiftness.

You can use Primal Stampede, and your Movement Speed increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Tiger Heart
summary: Rage: Tiger  Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their tiger-like anger to increase their jump distance.
description:
Go into a Rage that empowers your leaps.

You can use Tiger's Bloodlust, and your jump distance increases by m=4.5|ft=15.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rage: Wild Magic
summary: Rage: Wild Magic is a Wild Magic Barbarian Bonus Action. When you Rage, it causes a random magical effect to happen.
description: Enter a Rage to gain resistance against physical damage and deal extra melee damage. Barbarians gain Rage at level 1.

name: Rage: Wolf Heart
summary: Rage: Wolf Heart is a Wildheart Bonus Action. This ability allows them to use their wolf-like anger to aid their allies in combat.
description:
Go into a Rage so inciting it spurs on your allies.

You can use Inciting Howl, and each ally within earshot can move an additional 3m / 10ft during their next turn.

Rage ends early if you haven't attacked a creature or taken damage since your last turn.

name: Rally
summary: Rally is a Battle Master Bonus Action. This combat manoeuvre allows the Fighter to inspire an ally and grant them additional temporary hit points.
description: Expend a superiority die to bolster the resolve of a friendly creature. It gains an additional Healing|8 Temporary Hit Points

name: Ranger Knight
summary: Ranger Knight is a Ranger Passive Effect of Heavy Armour as a result of your history with nations.
description: You have sworn to serve a crown or nation and seek to bring its foes to ruin. Gain Heavy Armour.

name: Reckless Roar
summary: Reckless Roar is an class action available to Minotaurs that gives them Advantage on attacks made and attacks received.
description: Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls. Attackers also gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against you.

name: Relentless Avenger
summary: Relentless Avenger is a Passive Class Feature of Oath of Vengeance. This ability allows a Paladin to pursue fleeing enemies.
description: If you hit an enemy with an Opportunity Attack, your movement speed increases by 4.5m / 15ft on your next turn.

name: Relentless Rage
summary: Relentless Rage is a Barbarian Passive Feature. While raging, the barbarian is harder to defeat.
description: Once per Short Rest, if you drop to 0 hit point while Rage|Enraged, you regain 1|Healing instead of being Downed.

name: Reliable Talent
summary: Reliable Talent is a passive feature gained by Rogues at level 11. It makes Skills with Proficiency more consistent by treating any roll under 10 as a 10.
description: When you make an Ability Check with a Skill you are Proficient with, the lowest result you can roll on the die is 10.

name: Remarkable Athlete: Jump
summary: Remarkable Athlete: Jump is a Champion passive feature that increases their jump distance by m=3|ft=10.
description: You're a master of your own body, your athletic prowess extended beyond the usual. Your Jump distance is increased by m=3|ft=10.

name: Remarkable Athlete: Proficiency
summary: Remarkable Athlete: Proficiency is a Champion passive feature that adds half of their Proficiency Bonus to any Strength, Dexterity, and Constitution Checks they are not Proficient in.
description: You're a master of your own body, your athletic prowess extended beyond the usual. You can add half of your Checks that you are not Proficient in.

name: Repelling Blast
summary: Repelling Blast is an Warlock}} class. It allows you to push creatures around with [[Eldritch Blast
description: When you hit a creature with Eldritch Blast, you can push the creature up to m=4.5|ft=15 away from you.

name: Sanctified Stalker
summary: Sanctified Stalker is a Ranger Passive Effect of Favoured Enemy. You gain proficiency with Religion and can cast Sacred Flame as a result of your religious training.
description: You swore to hunt the enemies of a holy or druidic order. You gain Proficiency in Religion and can cast Sacred Flame.

name: Sculpt Spells
summary: Sculpt Spells is an Evocation passive feature prevents your allies from taking damage from some of your spells.
description: Create pockets of safety within your Evocation spells. Allies automatically succeed their SavingThrows against these spells and take no damage from them.

name: Sculptor of Flesh
summary: Sculptor of Flesh is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You can cast Polymorph with a Warlock spell slot.
description: You can cast Polymorph with a Warlock spell slot.

name: Second Wind
summary: Second Wind is a Fighter Bonus Action. This ability allows them to heal themselves in the midst of battle.
description: Draw on your stamina to protect yourself. You regain 1d10 + Fighter Level|Healing.

name: Second-Story Work
summary: Second-Story Work is a Thief passive feature that grants Resistance against falling damage.
description: You've mastered the art of falling and gain Resistance to Falling damage.

name: Seismic Wrath
summary: Seismic Wrath is an Action used by Grym. Causes no known effect at this time.
description: Grym makes the earth quake and the ground roar - anything to eliminate intruders.

name: Shadow Arts: Hide
summary:
PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow Bonus Action. This ability allows Monks to use their Bonus Action to Hiding (Condition)|Hide from view.

For the Rogue version of this skill, see Cunning Action: Hide
description: Hide from enemies by succeeding at Stealth checks. Stick to the dark and avoid enemy sightlines. Attacking or casting a spell will reveal your location.

name: Shadow Step
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of Shadow bonus that allows you to enter the shadows and reappear at a distant location, granting you Advantage on your next attack.
description:
Teleport from shadow to shadow.

Afterwards, you have Advantage on your next melee Attack Roll.

name: Sign of Ill Omen
summary: Sign of Ill Omen is an Eldritch Invocation from the Warlock class. You learn how to cast Bestow Curse.
description: You can cast Bestow Curse with a Warlock Spell Slot.

name: Slam (Ansur)
summary: Slam is a unique Class Action available to Ansur that deals melee bludgeoning damage.
description: Slam the ground, possibly knocking nearby targets Prone.

name: Slam (Flesh)
summary: Slam is a class action available to Flesh that deals melee bludgeoning damage.
description: Hit a target with your bare fists.

name: Slow Fall
summary: Slow Fall is a Reaction gained by Monks at Level 4. Slow Fall allows the Monk to gain Resistance to falling damage.
description: When you fall, you can use your reaction to gain Resistance to Falling damage.

name: Split Enchantment
summary: Split Enchantment is an Enchantment passive feature that enables you to target 2 creatures when casting an Enchantment spell that normally only targets 1.
description: You know your enchantments inside and out. You can target 2 creatures with Enchantment spells that would normally only target 1 creature.

name: Spreading Spores (Class Action)
summary: Spreading Spores is a Circle of the Spores class action. While Symbiotic Entity is active, you can create a cloud of spores that deals Necrotic damage to any creature that walks through or starts its turn in the cloud and fails a CON.
description:
Seed an area in deadly spores that deal 2d8|Necrotic damage per turn to all creatures that inhale them, except you and your allies.

The spores disappear when Symbiotic Entity ends.

name: Spreading Spores (Passive Feature)
summary: Spreading Spores is a Circle of the Spores Passive Feature that allows you to attack an area with a cloud of Spreading Spores
description: While Symbiotic Entity is active, you can create a cloud of Spreading Spores (Class Action)|Spreading Spores.

name: Stalker's Flurry
summary: Stalker's Flurry' is a Gloom Stalker passive feature that lets you continue attacking when you miss.
description: When you miss with a weapon attack, you can make another one for free.

name: Steel Will
summary: Steel Will is a Hunter Passive Feature that strengthens your mind against fear.
description: Advantage on SavingThrows against being Frightened.

name: Step of the Wind: Dash
summary: Step of the Wind: Dash is a Monk Bonus Action gained at Level 2. Step of the Wind: Dash allows the Monk to spend a bonus action and a ki to Dash and to make Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump free to use.
description: Double your movement speed. Jump no longer requires a bonus.

name: Step of the Wind: Disengage
summary: Step of the Wind: Disengage is a Monkbonus gained at Level 2. It allows the Monk to spend abonus and a ki to Disengage and makes Jump (Bonus Action)|Jump free to use.
description: Move without triggering Opportunity Attacks. Jump no longer requires a bonus.

name: Stillness of Mind
summary: Stillness of Mind is a Monk passive feature that is automatically cast when Charmed (Condition)|Charmed or Frightened (Condition)|Frightened to remove said conditions.
description: If you are Charmed or Frightened, you automatically cast Stillness of Mind to remove the condition.

name: Storm's Fury
summary: Storm's Fury is a Storm Sorcery reaction that deals damage when hit by a melee attack and pushes the attacker away.
description: When you are hit by a melee attack, you deal (Sorcerer Level)|Lightning damage to the attacker and potentially push them away.

name: Stormheart Nova
summary: Stormheart Nova is a unique Class Action available only to Ansur, after he gains the condition Hoarding Energy.
description: Blast the entire arena with an explosion of lightning, possibly Shocked|Shocking your foes.

name: Strike of the Guardian
summary: Strike of the Guardian is an Action usable by Guardians of Faith.
description: Channel the power of your deity in your sword strike to protect the cleric that brought you into being.

name: Superior Darkvision
summary: Superior Darkvision is a passive feature that prevents Disadvantage when attacking creatures in the dark within m=24|ft=80, double the distance of normal Darkvision Icon|Darkvision (Passive Feature)|Darkvision|size=24.
description: Can see in the dark up to 24m.

name: Tempestuous Magic
summary: Tempestuous Magic is a Storm Sorcery Passive Feature that enables you to safely disengage from enemies after casting a leveled spell.
description: After you cast a Level 1 Tempestuous Magic: Flight|Fly}} as a Bonus Action up to ft=30 until the end of your turn without receiving [[Opportunity Attacks.

name: Tempestuous Magic: Flight
summary: Tempestuous Magic: Flight allows a Storm Sorcery to disengage and fly away after casting a Level 1 spell or higher, without risk of being attacked by enemies.
description: Fly to a nearby spot without receiving Opportunity Attacks.
notes:
*This is extra movement added on top of whatever movement you already have
*Spell Scrolls will also allow you to use this bonus action.

name: Thief of Five Fates
summary: Thief of Five Fates is an Warlock}} class. It allows you to cast [[Bane (Spell) once per Long Rest.
description:
Once per Bane (Spell)|Bane}} using a Warlock [[Spell Slot.

Bane targets up to 3 creatures. They receive a 1d4 penalty to Attack Rolls and Saving Throws.

name: Thought Shield: Psychic Reflection
summary: Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance is a passive feature unique to the Great Old One subclass that damages attackers with the same damage when damaged with Psychic damage.
description: Your patron doesn't appreciate attempts to attack your mind. When you take Psychic damage, your attacker takes the same damage.

name: Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance
summary: Thought Shield: Psychic Resistance is a passive feature unique to the Great Old One subclass that grants Resistance to Psychic damage.
description: An elder being shields your brain. You gain Resistance to Psychic damage.

name: Thunderbolt Strike
summary: Thunderbolt Strike is a level 6 Tempest Domain Passive Feature that pushes Large or smaller creatures m=3|ft=10 that are dealt Thunder or Lightning damage from the Cleric.
description: When you deal Thunder or Lightning damage to a creature that is Large or smaller, you can also push it up to m=3|ft=10.

name: Tides of Chaos
summary: Tides of Chaos is a Wild Magic reaction that grants Advantage on your next Attack Roll, Ability Check, or Saving Throw and increases the chance of a Wild Magic surge afterwards.
description: Gain Advantage on your next Attack Roll, D20|25 Wild Magic surge afterwards.

name: Tranquility
summary: PAGENAME is a Way of the Open Hand passive feature that prevents enemies from directly harming the monk until the first time they attack each day (effectively a free use of Sanctuary).
description: Long_rest_iconLong Rests surround you with an aura of peace, granting you Sanctuary (Condition)|Sanctuary permanently until you attack.

name: Transmuter's Stone
summary: Transmuter's Stone is a Transmutation free action that allows you to create Transmuter's Stones which allow you to give a creature various benefits by holding that stone.
description:
Store some of your transmutation magic in a small stone. A creature carrying the stone gains a benefit of your choice.

Once you have created a stone, you need to cast a Transmutation spell of Level 1 or higher or take a Long Rest before you can create another one.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Acid Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Acid Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Acid damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Cold Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Cold Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by a Cold attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Cold damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Proficiency in Constitution Saving Throws.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Darkvision
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Constitution is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides Darkvision to a range of m=18|ft=60
description: Create a stone that lets the carrier see in the dark out to a range of m=18|ft=60.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Fire Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Fire Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by a Fire attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Fire damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Lightning Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Lightning Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Lightning damage.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Speed
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Speed is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that allows you to create a stone that provides increased movement speed.
description: Create a stone that increases the carrier's movement speed by m=3|ft=10.

name: Transmuter's Stone: Thunder Resistance
summary: Transmuter's Stone: Thunder Resistance is a variation of Transmuter's Stone that makes you take half as much damage when hit by an Acid attack.
description: Create a stone that grants the carrier Resistance to Thunder damage.

name: Two-Weapon Fighting
summary: Two-Weapon Fighting is a Fighting Style passive feature.
description: When you make an offhand attack, you can add your Ability Score Modifier to the damage of the attack.

name: Unarmoured Defence (Barbarian)
summary: Unarmoured Defence is a Barbarian passive feature that adds your Constitution modifier to your Armour Class in addition to your Dexterity modifier when not wearing armour.
description: Your body is as resilient as any armour. While not wearing Constitution Modifier to your ArmourClass. Wearing Heavy Armour impedes your Rage.

name: Unarmoured Defence (Monk)
summary: Unarmoured Defence is a Monk passive feature that adds your modifier to your ArmourClass when not wearing armour or shields.
description: Your reflexes are as effective as any Wisdom Modifier to your ArmourClass.

name: Unarmoured Movement
summary: Unarmoured Movement is a Monk Passive Feature that increases movement distance by m=3|ft=10 while not wearing shield.
description: Your movement speed increases by m=3|ft=10 while you are not wearing armour or using a shield.

name: Uncanny Dodge
summary: Uncanny Dodge is a togglable passive gained by Rogues at Level 5. Uncanny Dodge allows the Rogue to reduce incoming damage once per round.
description: Use your lightning-quick reflexes to protect yourself. When an attack hits you, you only take half the usual damage.

name: Undead Thralls: Additional Undead
summary: Undead Thralls: Additional Undead is a Necromancy passive feature that allows you to raise additional undead when you cast the Animate Dead spell.
description: When you use Animate Dead, you can raise an additional corpse.

name: Undead Thralls: Animate Dead
summary: Undead Thralls: Animate Dead is a Necromancy passive feature that grants you the spell Animate Dead.
description: You gain the Animate Dead spell, if you didn't have it already

name: Undead Thralls: Better Summons
summary: Undead Thralls: Better Summons is a Necromancy passive feature that enhances the undead you raise with Animate Dead. They gain additional hit points and extra damage.
description: Creatures created with Animate Dead have additional hit points equal to your wizard level, and your Proficiency Bonus is added to their damage.

name: Unstable Backlash
summary: Unstable Backlash is a Wild Magic Barbarian Passive Feature. While raging, receiving damage will trigger the effects of Wild Magic.
description: While Raging, when you take damage or fail a Wild Magic effect that replaces the current one.

name: Urban Tracker
summary: Urban Tracker is a Ranger Passive Effect of Natural Explorer. Grants you proficiency in Sleight of Hand, as you an expert in navigating cities.
description: An expert at navigating the wild within the city, you gain Sleight of Hand Proficiency.

name: Ursine Reinforcements
summary: Ursine Reinforcements is an action available to the level 11 or higher Bear companion from the Beast Master action Bear Companion that summons another bear to fight alongside your current Bear companion.
description: You summon an additional bear to fight alongside you.

name: Vow of Enmity
summary: Vow of Enmity is an Oath of Vengeance Action. This ability allows them to hit their attacks more easily.
description: Gain Advantage on Attack Rolls against an enemy.

name: War God's Blessing
image:
War God's Blessing.webp
}}{{ up to date | 2023-09-05 }} {{ActionPage
summary: War God's Blessing is a War Domain}}s. This ability allows these Clerics to grant their ally a +10 to an Attack Roll at the cost of one Cleric#Level_2|Channel Divinity Charge. This does not cost a Reaction to use. [[War Domain Clerics get Guided Strike at an earlier level for themselves; War God's Blessing is a variation of Guided Strike for their allies.
description: War God's Blessing is a Reaction available to War Domain Clerics. This ability allows these Clerics to grant their ally a +10 to an Attack Roll at the cost of one Channel Divinity Charge. This does not cost a Reaction to use.

name: War Magic
summary: War Magic is a Eldritch Knight Passive Feature. This allows the Fighter to make an attack after using a Cantrip by using a Bonus Action.
description: You have honed your body and magic for war. After you cast a cantrip, you can make a weapon attack using a bonus.

name: War Priest
summary: War Priest is a War Domain passive that allows the Cleric to attack using a bonus and a War Priest.
description:
When you make an unarmed or weapon attack, you can spend a War Priest to make an additional attack as a bonus.

A War Domain Cleric begins with three War Priest|forceplural=yes per long rest. This increases to:

* Four charges at Cleric Level 5
* Five charges at Cleric Level 8
* Six charges at Cleric Level 11

name: Warding Flare
summary: Warding Flare is a Light Domain Reaction. It allows a Cleric to impose a Disadvantage on an attacker, increasing the chance for the attack to miss.
description: Shield yourself with divine light. Use your reaction to impose Disadvantage on an attacker, possibly causing their attack to miss.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Cold
summary: Wasteland Wanderer: Cold is a Ranger Passive Effect of Natural Explorer. As an explorer of the cold winterlands, you gain resistance to Cold.
description: You have spent endless days surviving desolate tundras. Gain resistance to Cold damage, taking only half damage from it.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Fire
summary: Wasteland Wanderer: Fire is a Ranger Passive Effect of Natural Explorer.You are well versed in traveling in hot environments, you gain resistance to Fire.
description: You have spent endless days surviving forbidding deserts. Gain resistance to Fire, taking only half damage from it.

name: Wasteland Wanderer: Poison
summary: Wasteland Wanderer: Poison is a Ranger Passive Effect of Natural Explorer. Swamps are like a second home to you, you gain resistance to Poison.
description: You have spent endless days surviving fetid swamps. Gain resistance to Poison, taking only half damage from it.

name: Whispers of the Grave
summary: Whispers of the Grave is an Warlock}} class. You can cast Speak with Dead without expending a [[Spell Slot.
description: You can cast Speak with Dead without expending a Spell Slot.

name: Wild Magic (Subclass Feature)
summary: Wild Magic is a Wild Magic passive feature that triggers a random magical effect sometimes when you cast a Level 1 or higher Spell. To trigger the effect, a 20 needs to be rolled on a D20.
description:
Unruly magic sparks and fizzes through your veins. Each time you cast a spell of Level 1 or higher, your magic might surge and trigger a random magic effect.

:Wild Magic table (Sorcerer)
notes: *A 1d20 is rolled each time you cast a leveled spell, and if the result is 20 then a Wild Magic Surge is triggered.

name: Wild Magic: Action Surge
summary: Wild Magic: Action Surge is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect grants an extra action just like the Fighter skill Action Surge.
description: You gain an additional action this turn.

name: Wild Magic: Blur
summary: Wild Magic: Blur is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows them to blur the body of every creature in the vicinity, making it harder to hit the blurred targets.
description: Each creature within m=9|ft=30 becomes Blurred.

name: Wild Magic: Bolt of Light
summary: Wild Magic: Bolt of Light is a special Wild Magic Barbarian class action that is randomly granted when you trigger a Wild Magic roll. It allows you to shoot a bolt of light from your chest that deals Radiant damage and has a chance to Blind.
description: Shoot a bolt of light from your chest that Blinds the target

name: Wild Magic: Burning
summary: Wild Magic: Burning is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect damages all nearby creatures and items with fire damage.
description: Each creature and item within m=6|ft=20 starts burning and takes 1d6|Fire per turn.

name: Wild Magic: Cambion
summary: Wild Magic: Cambion is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect summons a hostile Cambion that attacks all creatures in sight.
description: Summon a cambion from the fiery nexus of the Nine Hells. It is hostile to everyone.

name: Wild Magic: Cats and Dogs
summary: Wild Magic: Cats and Dogs is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect transforms every creature around you randomly into either a cat or a dog.
description: Each creature within m=9|ft=30 is randomly transformed into either a cat or a dog.

name: Wild Magic: Dark Tendrils
summary: Wild Magic: Dark Tendrils is a special Wild Magic Barbarian class action that is randomly granted when you trigger a Wild Magic roll. Every turn, you deal Necrotic damage to every creature around you while also healing yourself.
description: Shadowy tendrils lash outwards from you. Each creature within m=9|ft=30 of you must succeed a CON or take 1d12|Necrotic damage. Additionally, you gain Healing|1d12 HealingHealing|Temporary Hit Points.

name: Wild Magic: Enchant Weapons
summary: Wild Magic: Burning is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows them to magically empower the weapons of every nearby creature, allowing them to make one powerful strike.
description: Enchant the weapon of each creature within m=6|ft=20. Their next attack is a Critical Hit and deals an additional 1d4|Force.

name: Wild Magic: Enlarge/Reduce
summary: Wild Magic: Enlarge/Reduce is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect randomly enlarges or shrinks creatures in an area, including yourself. The chance of either effect is 50%.
description: Each creature within m=9|ft=30 is randomly Enlarged or Reduced.

name: Wild Magic: Entangle
summary: Wild Magic: Entangle is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect creates vines on the ground nearby that can trap creatures just like the Entangle spell.
description: Create a vine surface around yourself, slowing down creatures, possibly Entangled (Condition)|Entangling them.

name: Wild Magic: Explosive Healing
summary: Wild Magic: Explosive Healing is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows them to blur the body of every creature in the vicinity, making it harder to hit the blurred targets.
description: When you hit a target with a spell, heal all creatures within m=3|ft=10 for 1d4|Healing per Spell Slot level used.

name: Wild Magic: Flight
summary: Wild Magic: Flight is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect grants the ability to Fly just like the Grant Flight spell.
description: You can Fly (Class Action)|Fly until the end of the turn.

name: Wild Magic: Fog
summary: Wild Magic: Fog is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows them to spontaneously create a fog around themselves that Blind every creature inside it.
description: Create a cloud of fog around yourself. Creatures within are Heavily Obscured and Blinded.

name: Wild Magic: Intangible Spirit
summary: Wild Magic: Intangible Spirit is a special Wild Magic Barbarian class action that is randomly granted when you trigger a Wild Magic roll. It allows you to summon a spectral flumph that explodes at the end of your turn, dealing damage in an area.
description: Summon a spectral flumph. The flumph explodes at the end of your turn, dealing 1d6|Force damage to each creature within ft=7.

name: Wild Magic: Magic Retribution
summary: Wild Magic: Magic Retribution is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic Barbarian. Damages enemies who hit you with Force damage.
description: You are protected by wild, vengeful magic. Enemies that hit you take 1d6|Force damage in retaliation.

name: Wild Magic: Polymorph
summary: Wild Magic: Polymorph is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect randomly polymorphs each creature in an area as a Sheep, including yourself. Similar to the Polymorph Spell.
description: You are transformed into a beast.

name: Wild Magic: Protective Lights
summary: Wild Magic: Protective Lights is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic Barbarian. Magical lights surround and circle you, protecting you. You and your allies nearby receive an extra +1 Armour Class.
description: You, and any allies within m=3|ft=10 of you, have a +1 bonus to Armour Class.

name: Wild Magic: Resilient Sphere
summary: Wild Magic: Resilient Sphere is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect works just like casting Otiluke's Resilient Sphere on yourself.
description: Enclose yourself in an arcane sphere. You cannot be damaged by attacks or effects from outside the sphere, nor can you damage anything outside the sphere. Movement Speed is halved.

name: Wild Magic: Shield
summary: Wild Magic: Shield is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect grants extra Armour Class and protection from Magic Missiles just like the Shield spell.
description: Armour Class is increased by 5 and you are immune to the effects of Magic Missile

name: Wild Magic: Slow
summary: Wild Magic: Slow is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This negative effect places the Slowed condition on you from the Slow spell, reducing your Armour Class, Dexterity Saving Throws and actions.
description: You are Slowed.

name: Wild Magic: Sorcery Points
summary: Wild Magic: Sorcery Points is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows you to regain some sorcery points when casting spells, depending on the level.
description: Until the end of your next turn, each spell you cast restores Sorcery Points equal to its Spell Slot level.

name: Wild Magic: Speak with Animals
summary: Wild Magic: Speak with Animals is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect grants you the ability to talk to various animals and creatures who don't normally speak your language.
description: Gain the ability to comprehend and communicate with beasts.

name: Wild Magic: Spike Growth
summary: Wild Magic: Spike Growth is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect shapes the ground nearby into spikes that are Difficult Terrain, and deal Piercing damage if a creature walks over them. Similarly to Spike Growth
description: Shape a piece of ground around yourself into hard spikes. A creature walking on the spikes takes 2d4|Piercing for every m=1.5|ft=5 it moves.

name: Wild Magic: Summon Mephit
summary: Wild Magic: Summon Mephit is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect summons a hostile Mephit, that attacks every creature in the area.
description: Summon a hostile mephit.

name: Wild Magic: Swap
summary: Wild Magic: Swap is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect allows them to teleport to a creature's location when they cast a Cantrip or a 1st Level Spell.
description: Swap positions with a target each time you cast a spell or cantrip.

name: Wild Magic: Telekinesis
summary: Wild Magic: Telekinesis is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This effect works just like casting the Telekinesis spell.
description: Able to lift and throw objects and creatures with your mind until the end of your turn.

name: Wild Magic: Teleport (Barbarian)
summary: Wild Magic: Teleport is a special Wild Magic Barbarian class action that is randomly granted when you trigger a Wild Magic roll. It allows you to teleport as a bonus action every turn.
description: As a bonus, teleport up to ft=60 to an unoccupied space you can see

name: Wild Magic: Turn Magic
summary: Wild Magic: Turn Magic is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic. This ability constantly creates more wild magic effects over the next several turns.
description: At the start of each turn, trigger a random magical effect.

name: Wild Magic: Vine Growth
summary: Wild Magic: Vine Growth is a special Wild Magic Barbarian class feature that is randomly granted when you trigger a Wild Magic roll. Plants and vines extend from you causing Difficult Terrain to creatures near you. This area is centered on you and moves with you.
description: Flowers and vines spread outward from you in a radius of m=4.5|ft=15 creating Difficult Terrain Condition Icon|Difficult Terrain (Condition)|Difficult Terrain|size=25 for everyone other than you.

name: Wild Magic: Weapon Infusion
summary: Wild Magic: Weapon Infusion is a Wild Magic effect of the Wild Magic Barbarian.
description: Magic infuses your weapon. It deals an additional 1d6|Force damage and gains the Light and Thrown properties. If thrown, it reappears in your hand at the end of your turn.

name: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Air Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of an Air Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast lightning spells. 

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a Flail of the Vortex that adds +1d8|Lightning to every attack.

name: Wild Shape: Bear
summary: Wild Shape: Bear is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon Druids.
description: Take the shape of a Bear with high Hit Points that can goad enemies into attacking it.

name: Wild Shape: Cave Bear
summary: Wild Shape: Cave Bear is a special Wild Shape form available only to Halsin.
description: Assume the shape of a cave bear that can Goading Roar|Goad enemies into attacking it. The cave bear has a starting health of Healing|36 hit points that increases every two druid levels

name: Wild Shape: Dire Raven
summary: Wild Shape: Dire Raven is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description: Take the shape of of a Dire Raven that can fly and Blind enemies.

name: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Earth Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of an Earth Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast earth spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges.

name: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Fire Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moons.
description:
Take the shape of a Fire Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast fire spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Scimitar that adds +1d6|Fire to every attack.

name: Wild Shape: Sabre-Toothed Tiger
summary: Wild Shape: Sabre-Toothed Tiger is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moons.
description: Take the shape of a Sabre-Toothed Tiger that can shred armour and regenerate hit points.

name: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon
summary: Wild Shape: Water Myrmidon is a Combat Wild Shape form available to Circle of the Moon.
description:
Take the shape of a Water Myrmidon who gains the ability to fly and to cast healing and cold spells.

This shape consumes 2 Wild Shape charges, and comes equipped with a +3 Trident that adds +1d6|Cold to every attack.

name: Wild Strike
summary: Wild Strike is a Druid Passive Feature that lets you make multiple unarmed attacks while Wildshaped.
description: You can make an additional attack after making an unarmed strike while in wildshape.

name: Wrath of the Storm
summary: Wrath Of The Storm is a Tempest Domain Reaction. It allows the Cleric to strike back an attacking creature using a reaction, doing Lightning damage or Thunder damage.
description: As a reaction, strike back at an attacking creature, dealing 2d8|Lightning or 2d8|Thunder damage. The target takes half damage on a successful SavingThrow.

name: Power Word Kill
summary: Power Word Kill is a Level 9 Enchantment Spell. This spell kills an enemy.
description: Rasp a word of power, compelling an enemy with 100 hit points or fewer to forfeit its meager existence and die instantly
condition: Ritual Chant: Bhaal's Power Word Kill

name: Create Sorcery Points
summary: Create Sorcery Points is a Level 2 Sorcerer Bonus Action. This ability allows Sorcerers to transform arcane magic into their innate sorcery powers.
description: Spend Spell Slots to gain Sorcery Points. The level of spell slot spent creates the equivalent number in sp|forceplural=yes

name: Danse Macabre
summary: Danse Macabre is a 5th level Necromancy spell that summons 4 uncontrollable Ghouls to fight for you.
description: Create 4 ghouls that fight alongside you.

name: Divine Smite
summary: Divine Smite allows a Paladin to expend a Spell Slot to deal additional Radiant damage with a melee weapon attack.
description: Your weapon emanates divine might as you strike, dealing an additional 2d8|Radiant|drs=t damage. Deals an additional 1d8|Radiant|drs=t damage to Fiends and Undead.

name: Guildmaster Keene's Fixers
summary: Guildmaster Keene's Fixers is a unique Class Action only available during the Confront the Elder Brain quest. It allows you to summon Lady Coup and Lady Lockjaw to aid you in the final battle.
description:
Summon two elite assassasin mercenaries from the Guild's ranks.

Dismissed after combat until re-summoned.

Can't be summoned again if killed in combat.

name: Gur Huntwardens
summary: Gur Huntwardens is a unique Class Action only available during the Confront the Elder Brain quest. It allows you to summon two Gur Hunter Warriors and a Gur Hunter Sharpshooter to aid you in the final battle.
description:
Summon Gur Monster hunters to hinder enemies while slipping in and out of the frontlines.

Dismissed after combat until re-summoned.

Can't be summoned again if killed in combat.

name: Karsus' Compulsion
summary:
Karsus' Compulsion is a Level 9 Enchantment Spell.nograd=1
Channel the stones' magic to control the Crown of Karsus.
notes:
* Granted by holding the Triune Netherstone. This spell may only be cast by a Mind Flayer.
* This is one of only three 9th Level spells featured in Baldur's Gate 3. verify The other two are:
** Wish, cast by Vlaakith at the end of Creche Y'llek if the player doubts her power.
** Power Word Kill, a special variant of which is cast by Farslayer of Bhaal Ghislev in the Undercity Ruins.
* Unlike Wish and Power Word Kill, Karsus' Compulsion was created specifically for Baldur's Gate 3.

name: Mammon's Tax
summary: Mammon's Tax is a Class Action known by Helsik. It deals 6d6 Slashing damage to a target for every 500 gold it has.
description: Rend the flesh of a greedy creature, dealing 6d6 Slashing damage for every 500 gold it has.

name: Power Word Kill
summary: Power Word Kill is a Level 9 Enchantment Spell. This spell kills an enemy.
description: Compel an enemy with 100 Hit Points or fewer to die instantly. Limited to one use only.

name: Ride the Winds
summary: Ride the Winds is a unique Level 3 Transmutation Spell that can be cast when wearing Amulet of Windrider. It allows spellcasters to transform into a cloud.
description: Transform into a cloud, becoming Resistant to all damage, gains Advantage on Constitution, Dexterity, and Strength Saving Throws, and becomes Tiny in size. While transformed, the target won't be able to attack, cast spells, or talk.

name: Selûne's Dream
summary: Selûne's Dream is a Cantrip (Evocation). It heals an ally, but may also put them to sleep. Selûne's Dream is in game only as a once per Long Rest action granted by the item Amulet of Selûne's Chosen.
description:
An ally you touch regains hit points, but possibly falls Sleeping|asleep.

No effect on undead and constructs.
